packages.title: Singapore- 5 Days / 4 Nights
packages.subTitle: Couple & Family Oriented Tour Package
exclusions: Lunch or Dinner (Dinner - Except Day 1 or Day 3)

itinerary.day: Day 1 - Singapore: Arrival and Night Safari
activities: Arrival in Singapore and transfer to the hotel by representatives.
Check-in and relax at the hotel.
Evening visit to Night Safari, the world's first nocturnal zoo.
Witness over 2,500 animals from 130 species, observing their natural behaviors.
Enjoy cultural shows and traditional tribal dance performances.
Return to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 - Half-day City Tour and Sentosa
activities: Enjoy a delicious breakfast before starting the day's adventure.
Begin the half-day city tour visiting iconic monuments and landmarks.
Explore Dhoby Ghaut, Esplanade Theatre, Art Museum, and more.
Discover Central Business District, Civilian War Memorial, and Civic District.
Witness Helix Bridge, Istana, Marina Bay, and the Suntec City.
Visit the iconic Merlion Statue, Singapore Flyer, and Thian Hock Keng Temple.
Conclude the city tour with shopping at Plaza Singapura.
In the afternoon, head to Sentosa Island known for its beaches, restaurants, and casinos.
Enjoy an exciting cable car ride and explore attractions like Madame Tussauds and Wings of Time.
Return to the hotel for a relaxing overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 - Universal Studios
activities: Start your day with a fulfilling breakfast.
Embark on a full-day tour to Universal Studios for a day of excitement and fun.
Explore various shows and thrilling rides within the park.
Discover different themed zones such as New York, Hollywood, Ancient Egypt, Sci-Fi City, Far Far Away, The Lost World, and Madagascar.
Take the opportunity to purchase gifts and souvenirs.
Enjoy the diverse attractions and entertainment options Universal Studios has to offer.
After an exciting day, return to the hotel for a comfortable overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 - Gardens by the Bay
activities: Begin your day with a delectable breakfast.
Embark on a delightful tour of Gardens by the Bay.
Explore the futuristic and colorful park, spanning over 101 hectares.
Discover the three waterfront gardens: Bay South Garden, Bay East Garden, and Bay Central Garden.
Enjoy the serene surroundings and lush greenery of this beautiful nature park.
Cherish beautiful moments as you experience the soothing vibes of Gardens by the Bay.
After a fulfilling day, it's time to relax as you prepare to return home.

itinerary.day: Day 5 - Departure
activities: After a lip-smacking breakfast, check-out from your hotel with beautiful memories to board a flight back to your home destination.

itinerary.day: Day 1 - Arrival and Night Safari
activities: Upon your arrival in Singapore, a representative will assist you with the transfer to your hotel.
Check-in and relax at the hotel.
In the evening, embark on an exciting Night Safari tour.
Encounter over 2,500 nocturnal animals from 130 species including Malayan tigers, flying foxes, Asian elephants, and more.
Explore trekking and walking trails to immerse yourself in the atmosphere.
Enjoy cultural shows and traditional tribal dance performances.
Return to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 - Half-day City Tour and Sentosa
activities: Kickstart your day with a hearty breakfast.
Begin your city tour by visiting Dhoby Ghaut, Civilian War Memorial, Art Museum, Esplanade Theatre, and Civic District.
Visit Helix Bridge, Istana, Marina Bay, Suntec City, and Thian Hock Keng Temple.
See the iconic Merlion Statue and the Singapore Flyer.
End the city tour with shopping at Plaza Singapura.
In the afternoon, head to Sentosa Island for a day of fun.
Take an exciting cable car ride with a scenic view.
Visit attractions like Madame Tussauds and Wings of Time.
Return to the hotel for a comfortable overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 - Universal Studios
activities: Enjoy a delicious breakfast before heading out.
Visit Universal Studios, the region's first Hollywood movie theme park.
Experience movie-themed rides and shows.
Explore themed zones such as Madagascar, New York, Hollywood, Sci-Fi City, and The Lost World.
Watch the 4D adventure with Shrek in Far Far Away Castle.
Shop for souvenirs and gifts.
Return to the hotel after an exciting day.

itinerary.day: Day 4 - Transfer to Genting Dream Cruise
activities: Have breakfast and check-out from the hotel.
Board the Genting Dream Cruise for a memorable journey.
Enjoy world-class facilities and onboard entertainment.
Spend the evening enjoying various onboard activities.
Delight in a delicious dinner on the cruise.
Stay overnight on the cruise.

itinerary.day: Day 5 - On Cruise Tour
activities: Start the day with a scrumptious breakfast onboard.
Relax at the Jacuzzi or read at the Library.
Explore shore excursions such as snorkeling, scuba diving, or a glass-bottom boat ride.
Reserve your Malacca shore excursions in advance at the cruise reception.
Participate in onboard activities like cooking or salsa classes and swimming.
Enjoy a wide range of delicious meals throughout the day.
Stay overnight on the cruise and create unforgettable memories.

itinerary.day: Day 6 - Arrival, Leisure Day
activities: Have breakfast and disembark in Singapore.
Transfer to your hotel and check-in.
Spend the day at leisure or explore nearby places and restaurants.
Enjoy an overnight stay at the hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 7 - Gardens by the Bay
activities: Start your day with a hearty breakfast.
Visit Gardens by the Bay, a 101-hectare nature park.
Explore the Supertree Grove, Cloud Forest, and Flower Dome.
Enjoy the colorful and futuristic garden landscapes.
Take in the peaceful and vibrant scenery of the waterfront gardens.
Return to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 8 - Departure
activities: Enjoy a final breakfast at the hotel.
Check-out from the hotel and transfer to the airport.
Board your flight back home with memories to cherish.

itinerary.day: Day 1 - Arrival and Leisure
activities: Begin your Dream Cruise adventure by transferring from Singapore airport or hotel to the cruise on your own, ensuring you have all necessary documents and personal items.Upon boarding, take your time to explore the cruise and become familiar with its various amenities. Don't rush to your cabin; instead, roam about to discover the nooks and corners of the ship.

Consider visiting the Helipad Embarkation for a splendid view. This area is often less crowded, providing a perfect setting to enjoy the picturesque surroundings.Take advantage of the tasty meals available in the cruise's restaurants, and embark on the wonderful activities happening on board.
As the day unfolds, indulge in the diverse offerings of the cruise, creating memories and enjoying the vibrant atmosphere.
Retire for the night in your cozy cabin after savoring an elaborate dinner, looking forward to the adventures that await on your Dream Cruise.

itinerary.day: Day 2 - Dream Cruise: Unlimited Fun
activities: Start your day with the beautiful sunrise, embracing relaxation with outdoor activities like the jacuzzi, sauna, pool, and basking under the sun.
For fitness enthusiasts, the cruise offers a gym and opportunities to engage in activities like basketball.
Enjoy a tasty breakfast before setting off to explore the various attractions on the cruise, uncovering new experiences.
Dive into a broad spectrum of entertainment options, from dramatic live cabaret shows to honing your singing skills in the karaoke room.
Dance and revel throughout the night in the nightclub, try your luck in the casinos, and engage in strategic card games in the card room.
Explore a variety of indoor activities, including creative pursuits, deck games, cooking classes, rock climbing, contests, and golf swing improvement sessions.

As the evening progresses, savor the panoramic view of the sunset at its own pace. Consider starting the evening with a visit to the bar offering a diverse array of drinks for your pre-dinner entertainment.

For a gala and lavish dinner experience in one of your favorite restaurants, it's advisable to book early and ensure a delightful dining experience.Start your day with the beautiful sunrise, embracing relaxation with outdoor activities like the jacuzzi, sauna, pool, and basking under the sun.

itinerary.day: Day 3 - Bid Farewell and Deboard
activities: Conclude your Dream Cruise experience with another delightful breakfast on board, cherishing the memories of the enjoyable moments.
Bid farewell to the cruise, and make arrangements on your own for the transfer from the cruise terminal to Singapore Airport or the hotel of your choice.

itinerary.day: Day 1 - Arrival and Night Safari
activities: Upon your arrival in Singapore, our representative will facilitate your transfer to the hotel.After checking in, you have the entire day to relax and engage in leisure activities.
In the evening, embark on a unique adventure at the Worldâ€™s first nightlife park â€“ Night Safari.
Explore the after-dark wildlife, encountering residents like Malayan tigers, flying foxes, Asian elephants, tapirs, lions, giraffes, and flying squirrels.
Enjoy trekking and walking trails within the nocturnal zoo, and be entertained by cultural shows and traditional tribal dance performances.
Return to the hotel for an overnight stay, reminiscing about your wild evening.

itinerary.day: Transfer to a Cruise
activities: After a hearty breakfast, our representative will escort you to the Cruise terminal for an unforgettable experience.
Embark on the Genting Dream Cruise, renowned for its extraordinary cruising experiences through the Indian Ocean and South China Sea.
Indulge in a delightful lunch served on board as you begin your cruise adventure.
The evening unfolds with a myriad of exciting activities to enhance your journey.
Enjoy a pleasurable evening, followed by a sumptuous dinner served on board.
Retreat for a peaceful overnight stay on the cruise, serenaded by the gentle waves.

itinerary.day: Day 3 - Singapore: On Cruise
activities: Embrace the enchanting cruise experience, savoring the magic of each moment with your loved one.
Start the day with the breathtaking beauty of the sunrise over the vast expanse of the ocean, creating a romantic atmosphere on the cruise.
Enjoy a delightful breakfast on board, setting the tone for a day filled with discovery.
Explore the hidden gems of beautiful islands as the cruise docks at various ports, providing opportunities for adventure and relaxation.
Opt for watersports on these picturesque islands to add more excitement to your cruise journey.
Return onboard after a day of exploration and treat yourself to a delicious dinner.
Head to the bar for cheerful cocktails, followed by superb entertainment to enhance the onboard experience.
Retire to your comfortable cabin, where you can enjoy the soothing sounds of the waves as you drift into a peaceful night's sleep.

itinerary.day: Day 4 - Leisure Day
activities: On day 4, disembark from the cruise and arrive in Singapore, marking the continuation of your journey.
Check-in at the hotel and enjoy the flexibility to plan your day at leisure, allowing you to explore the vibrant city.
Consider visiting famous markets to indulge in some shopping or try the diverse and mouth-watering Singaporean cuisine.
Return to the hotel for a comfortable overnight stay, recharging for the adventures that lie ahead.

itinerary.day: Day 5 - City Tour with Sentosa
activities: Start the second day of your tour with a delightful breakfast at the hotel.

Embark on a half-day city tour, exploring significant landmarks such as the Art Museum, Civilian War Memorial, Dhoby Ghaut, Central Business District, Civic District, Esplanade Theatre, Singapore Flyer, Helix Bridge, Istana, Floating Marina Bay, Merlion Statue, Suntec City, and Thian Hock Keng Temple.
Engage in some shopping at Plaza Singapura Mall after the city tour.
In the later part of the day, venture to Sentosa Island, where you can visit Madame Tussauds, enjoy the Wings of Time show, and experience a cable car ride with breathtaking panoramic views.
Sentosa Island is renowned for its beautiful beaches, dining options, casinos, parks, and more.
After a day of exploration, return to the hotel for a comfortable overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 6 - Departure
activities: After enjoying a hearty breakfast, pack your bags, and check out from the hotel. You will be transferred to airport to catch your flight back to India. Board your flight with a treasure of photographs and memories to cherish.

packages.title: Vietnam- 6 Days / 5 Nights
packages.subTitle: Couple & Family Oriented Tour Package
exclusions: Lunch or Dinner (Dinner - Except Day 1 or Day 3)

itinerary.day: Day 1 - Arrival in Hanoi | Welcome to the Land of Ascending Dragon
activities: Upon arrival at Hanoi Airport, your driver will be there to pick you up and take you to your hotel.
Complete the check-in process at your hotel and settle in.
Enjoy the rest of the day at your leisure to explore Hanoi.
Consider visiting Hoan Kiem Lake (Sword Lake), Ngoc Son Temple, or St. Joseph's Cathedral.
Transfer to your hotel in a Toyota Vios, Hyundai Accent, or similar vehicle.
Your driver will meet you at Hanoi Airport and transfer you to your pre-booked hotel for an overnight stay.
Today's activity: Day at Leisure.

itinerary.day: Day 2 - Excursion to Ninh Binh | Enjoy a Boat Ride from Hao Lu to Tam Coc to Witness Limestone Caves
activities: The driver will pick you up from your hotel and transport you to Ninh Binh City. Upon arriving in Ninh Binh, you will visit the historic capital of Vietnam, Hao Lu, and explore the ancient temples of the Le and Dinh Dynasties.
Following your visit to Hao Lu, you'll embark on a boat ride from Hao Lu to Tam Coc, a charming village near Ninh Binh, where you can explore its limestone caves.
You'll then enjoy a cycling journey along serene roads through villages and rocky landscapes, traveling from Tam Coc to Bich Dong Pagoda.
Finally, you'll be transferred back to your hotel in Hanoi for an overnight stay.Transportation will be provided in an air-conditioned shuttle bus.
Activities: Excursion to Ninh Binh, Visit Ancient Temples of Le and Dinh Dynasties, Boat Ride at Tam Coc, Cycling from Tam Coc to Bich Dong Pagoda

itinerary.day: Day 3 - Hanoi to Sapa | Explore the Cat Cat Village
activities: After checking out from your hotel, your driver will collect you and drive you to Sapa, a charming mountain town.

Upon your arrival in Sapa, you'll savor a delectable lunch featuring local Vietnamese dishes.Following lunch, embark on a short walk to the entrance of Cat Cat village, home to the Black H'mong ethnic community. Nestled at the base of Fansipan Peak in a deep valley, the village offers captivating natural beauty.
With a local guide leading the way, you'll explore the village and gain insight into the villagers' way of life.
You'll then trek down to the Tien Sa Waterfall, where you can also admire the French-built Hydraulic Power Station.
To conclude your excursion, hike back uphill to catch your bus for a return journey to your hotel in Sapa.
Transportation will be provided in an air-conditioned shuttle bus.
Activities: Explore Sapa, Visit Cat Cat Village, Discover Tien Sa Waterfall, See the French-built Hydraulic Power Station.

itinerary.day: Day 4 - Fansipan Mountain Tour | Transfer Back to Hanoi
activities: Following check-out from your hotel, your driver will pick you up and transport you for a Fansipan Mountain tour.
You'll visit the majestic Fansipan peak, which stands as the tallest mountain on the Indochinese Peninsula, offering stunning views.
Embark on an awe-inspiring 20-minute cable car ride to reach the peak, during which you can revel in the spectacular scenery.
At the Fansipan peak, you can explore the Kim Son Bao Thang pagoda situated atop the mountain, featuring a large seated Buddha statue.
Further adventures await as you climb 600 steps to reach the pinnacle of Fansipan, known as the roof of Indochina.
Spend approximately 1.5 hours exploring and taking in the panoramic views.
Afterward, return to the cable car station for the journey back to Sapa.
From there, you'll continue to Hanoi for an overnight stay.
Transportation will be provided in an air-conditioned shuttle bus.
Activity: Fansipan Mountain Tour, Visit Fansipan Peak and Kim Son Bao Thang Pagoda, Cable Car Ride.

itinerary.day: Day 5 - Hanoi to Halong Bay | Enjoy an Overnight Cruise Ride at Halong Bay
activities: After checking out from your hotel, the driver will pick you up and transport you to Halong Bay for an overnight cruise stay, courtesy of an air-conditioned shuttle bus.
Once you arrive at Tuan Chau Tourist Wharf in Halong Bay, you'll embark on your cruise adventure. Enjoy a welcome drink as you check in to your private cabin.
Aboard the cruise, you'll be treated to a delicious lunch while cruising through the breathtaking landscapes of Halong Bay.
The cruise will take you to Titop Island, where a smaller passenger boat will transfer you to the island. Here, you can relax, soak up the sun, or enjoy a refreshing swim.
Subsequently, you'll head to Pearl Farm Village by boat, a charming location in Halong Bay. Explore the world of pearl cultivation and take part in activities like swimming and kayaking in the bay.
Return to the cruise, where you'll participate in a cooking class to learn how to prepare traditional dishes. Wind down your day with tea time on the sundeck.Your overnight stay will be on the cruise
Activity: Halong Bay Cruise, Titop Island Visit, Pearl Farm Village Exploration, Cooking Class, Swimming, Kayaking.
This will be the highlight of your trip in Vietnam, where you can explore the stunning natural beauty of Halong Bay.

itinerary.day: Day 6 - Departure From Hanoi | Bid Adieu with a Bag of Memories
activities: After checking out from your hotel, you'll be picked up by the driver and transferred to Hanoi Airport, ensuring you catch your flight to head back home.
Transportation will be provided in a Toyota Vios, Hyundai Accent, or a similar vehicle.

itinerary.day: Day 1 - Arrival At Hanoi - Transfer To Hotel
activities: Our driver will pick you up from your hotel lobby at the confirmed time. Please ensure you are ready at the lobby 15 minutes before the scheduled pickup.
You will be transferred to the airport for your flight. Breakfast is included.

itinerary.day: Day 2 - Full Day Hanoi City Tour With Optional Water Puppet Show (Extra Cost)
activities: Pick up from your hotel present in the Old Quarter.
Visit Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum, Quan Thanh Temple, and Tran Quoc Pagoda.
Explore Bat Trang pottery village (Mon, Wed & Fri) or similar program.
Visit the Ethnology Museum (Tue, Thu, Sat & Sun) or equivalent program.
Discover the Temple of Literature.
Explore Hanoi's Old Quarter.
Water puppet show in the evening.
Overnight stay at the hotel.
Meals Included: Breakfast and Dinner.

itinerary.day: Day 3 - Transfer To Halong Bay - Overnight Cruise
activities: Breakfast at the hotel.
Car pick-up at 9 AM.
3-hour scenic drive to Halong Bay.
Enjoy views of Red River delta, paddy fields, and rural villages.
Check-in on the cruise.
Lunch on board.
Explore Halong Bay's unique limestone formations and caves.
Opportunity for swimming or kayaking.
Return to the cruise for dinner.
Evening leisure activities.
Meals Included: Breakfast and Dinner

itinerary.day: Day 4 - Transfer To Hanoi - Fly To Da Nang
activities: Breakfast and check out
Transfer to the airport for your flight to Da Nang.
Upon arrival in Da Nang, you'll be greeted by our representative.
Transfer to your hotel in Da Nang.
rest of the day at your leisure to explore Da Nang.
Meals Included: Breakfast and Dinner

itinerary.day: Day 5 - Full Day Ba Na Hills And Golden Bridge
activities: Breakfast at your hotel.
Begin your excursion to Ba Na Hill, a remarkable destination in Danang.
Ride the cable car to the summit, which is nearly 1.5km above sea level.
Explore the area, including the Funicular train ride with stops at the D'Amour flower garden, old Debay wine cellar, and Linh Ung Pagoda.
Discover the old Debay Wine Cellar, a beautifully preserved cellar built by French colonialists in 1923.
Stroll through the Le Jardin D'Amour Gardens, a flower paradise surrounded by breathtaking natural beauty.
Visit Linh Ung Pagoda, one of the famous Linh Ung pagodas, and the Thich Ca Buddhist statue.
Enjoy lunch and then participate in various activities and games at Fantasy Park, inspired by Jules Verne's works.
Walk to the summit of Ba Na Mountain at 1487m above sea level, and visit the Bell Tower, Nghinh Phong Tower, and Golden Bridge, all surrounded by stunning natural scenery.
Return to the foothill in the late afternoon via the cable car.
Back to your hotel, where you'll have some free time.
Enjoy dinner and spend the night in Danang.
Meals Included: Breakfast and Dinner

itinerary.day: Day 6 - Hoi An Ancient Tour - Fly To Ho Chi Minh City
activities: Breakfast at your hotel.
Check out from your hotel and prepare for your journey to Halong Bay.
Your vehicle will be ready at 9 AM for a 3-hour drive to Halong Bay.
Halong Bay is a UNESCO-designated Natural World Heritage site known for its stunning landscapes.
During the scenic ride, you'll pass by the Red River delta and lush paddy fields where farmers are at work.
You'll encounter rural villages and the occasional sight of buffaloes employed for plowing.
Upon arrival, board the cruise for check-in and enjoy a delicious lunch.
Take some time to relax and refresh in your cabin.
Explore the beauty of Halong Bay, named "The Descending Dragon Bay" due to local legends.
Stroll along the shore and admire the unique limestone formations and caves.
Some of these caves can be entered by visitors and provide breathtaking views of the karst formations.
Enjoy a quick swim in the crystal-clear waters, and kayaking is available for those interested.
Kayak through the area, passing by floating houses and reaching the islets near Halong Bay.
Return to the cruise in the evening for dinner on board.
Spend your leisure time exploring the boat, participating in evening activities, or simply relaxing.
Meals Included: Breakfast and Dinner

itinerary.day: Day 7 - Full Day Ho Chi Minh City Tour With Cu Chi Tunnels
activities: Begin your day with a visit to the colonial-style Post Office and the iconic Notre Dame Cathedral in Saigon.
Continue your exploration with a visit to the Thien Hau Pagoda.
Explore a unique section in Saigon, the bustling Chinatown, where communication is in both Chinese and Vietnamese.
In the heart of this vibrant area is the grandiose "Cho Lon" or The Big Market.
Chinese residents in this quarter have achieved significant trading success through their knowledge, wisdom, and dynamic spirit.
After your morning exploration, enjoy lunch in Saigon.
In the afternoon, head northwest to the Cu Chi Tunnels, one of the few remaining monuments to the Vietnam War.
These tunnels, stretching over 200 kilometers, were dug by hand and served as the underground base for Vietnamese guerilla forces during the war.
At its peak, just before the Tet Offensive in 1968, the tunnel complex housed nearly 10,000 troops.
To this day, the Cu Chi Tunnels stand as one of the most impressive examples of the intensity and challenges of the war.
Return to Saigon in the late afternoon.
Enjoy dinner in Saigon.
Meals Included: Breakfast and Dinner

itinerary.day: Day 8 - Departure End Of Tour
activities: Breakfast at the hotel.
Check-out time is typically 12:00 PM.
Leisure time before departure.
Straight to the airport for your flight back home.
Meals included: Breakfast.

itinerary.day: Day 1 - Arrival in Hanoi
activities: Arrival at Noi Bai International Airport, Hanoi.
Transfer to hotel for check-in and relaxation.
Afternoon: Hanoi City Tour
Visit Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum and One Pillar Pagoda.
Explore the Temple of Literature, Vietnam's first university.
Stroll around Hoan Kiem Lake and explore the Old Quarter.
Evening: Traditional Water Puppet Show at the Thang Long Theatre.
Dinner at an Indian or local restaurant. (dinner not included)
Overnight in Hanoi

itinerary.day: Day 2 - Hanoi – Ninh Binh (B/L/-)
activities: Morning: Drive to Ninh Binh (approx. 2 hours).
Explore the Trang An Scenic Complex (UNESCO World Heritage Site) on a boat ride through caves and karst landscapes.
Visit Hoa Lu, the ancient capital of Vietnam, and explore its ancient temples.
Lunch at a local restaurant.
Afternoon: Climb the Mua Cave viewpoint for panoramic views over Tam Coc and the surrounding rice fields.
Return to Hanoi in the late afternoon.
Dinner at an Indian or local restaurant. (dinner not included)

itinerary.day: Day 3 - Hanoi – HaLong Bay & Overnight Cruise (B/L/D)
activities: Morning: Depart for Ha Long Bay (approx. 2.5 hours by road).
Arrive in HaLong Bay and embark on an overnight cruise.
Sail through the stunning seascape of limestone karsts and emerald waters.
Visit Sung Sot Cave (Surprise Cave) and take in the beauty of the formations.
Optional activities: Swimming, kayaking, or a visit to a local floating fishing village.
Lunch and Dinner on the cruise.
Overnight on the HaLong Bay cruise.

itinerary.day: Day 4 - Ha Long – Return to Hanoi (B/L/-)
activities: Morning: Continue cruising HaLong Bay.
Enjoy the peaceful morning scenery of the bay.
Visit Ti Top Island for panoramic views or relax on the beach.
Brunch on board, then return to the dock.
Transfer back to Hanoi.
Lunch in Hanoi.
Evening: Free time to explore the city’s night market or enjoy a street food tour.
Dinner at an Indian or local restaurant. (dinner not included)
Overnight in Hanoi.

itinerary.day: Day 5 - Hanoi – Sapa by Road (B/L/-)
activities: Morning: Depart for Sapa (approx. 5.5-hour scenic drive).
Pass through the stunning mountain landscapes of Northern Vietnam.
Arrive in Sapa around noon. Check into your hotel and relax.
Afternoon: Sapa Exploration

Visit Cat Cat Village and Sin Chai Village, traditional Hmong villages located at the base of Fansipan Mountain. Enjoy the breathtaking views of terraced rice fields, mountains, and local life in the valley.
Evening: Visit the Sapa Market and stroll around Sapa Lake.
Dinner at an Indian restaurant or local restaurant. (dinner not included)
Overnight in Sapa.

itinerary.day: Day 6 - Half-Day Tour in Sapa - Hanoi(B/L/-)
activities: Morning: Half-day Sapa Tour
Take the Fansipan Cable Car to the top of Fansipan Mountain, the highest peak in Indochina (3,143 meters), for panoramic views.
Afternoon: Check out and Lunch
Drive back to Hanoi (approx. 5.5 hours).
Reach Hanoi
Dinner at an Indian or local restaurant. (dinner not included)
Overnight in Hanoi.

itinerary.day: Day 7 - Hanoi – India (B/L/-)
activities: Morning: Free time in Hanoi.
Check out hotels, have lunch, take a city tour and go shopping in Hanoi.
Transfer to Noi Bai International Airport for your departure flight.

packages.title: Japan- 8 Days 7 Night
packages.subTitle: Couple & Family Oriented Tour Package
exclusions: Lunch or Dinner (Dinner - Except Day 1 or Day 3)

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Tokyo | Day at Leisure
activities: Welcome to Japan! Upon arrival at the Narita International Airport, get transferred to the hotel. Check in & enjoy your day at leisure. You can shop at Ginza, Tokyo's upscale shopping district or witness traditional performances at the Samurai Theater. In the evening, you can enjoy a stroll through Yoyogi Park or visit Shibuya Crossing, one of the busiest intersections in the world, among several other iconic attractions.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Tokyo Sightseeing Tour
activities: Today, head to the pick-up point- LOVE Sculpture & board the transfer for Tokyo city tour. Visit Meiji Jingu Shrine, a peaceful Shinto sanctuary surrounded by lush forests. Then, stop at the Imperial Palace, the heart of Japan's monarchy. Also, explore Senso Ji Temple in Asakusa, Tokyo's oldest temple, & futuristic Odaiba District, home to various shopping & entertainment options. After the tour, get driven to 1-chōme-7-2 Nishishinjuku, Shinjuku City & from there, head to the hotel on your own.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Excursion To Mount Fuji & Hakone
activities: Today, get ready to explore Mt. Fuji & Hakone. Start by heading to Shinjuku LoveGiulio Paolini Sculpture: Kaleidoscorpio & from there board the transfer to Mt. Fuji's 5th Station, offering views of Fuji Five Lakes. After that, enjoy a scenic Hakone ropeway ride offering views of Lake Ashi. Continue your journey to Owakudani Valley, known for its volcanic activity & hot springs. Later, get transferred to Odawara Station to board a bullet train to Tokyo. Upon arriving, reach the hotel on your own.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Transfer to Osaka | Day at Leisure
activities: In the morning, check out of the hotel in Tokyo and head to Tokyo station on your own to board the Shinkansen bullet train to Osaka (tickets included). Upon arrival, reach the hotel on your own and check in. Later, you can explore the city at your leisure. You can see places like Osaka Castle, known for its rich Japanese history or explore famous shopping spots like Den Den Town. You can explore other attractions & later, return to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Day Trip to Kyoto and Nara
activities: Head to the pick-up point, Namba Ocat Building, on your own to board your transfer for the day trip to Kyoto and Nara. Start by visiting Kinkaku-ji, the Golden Pavilion, famous for its dazzling gold-leafed exterior. Then, explore Arashiyama, known for its bamboo groves, where you can walk through towering bamboo stalks & click stunning photos. End your tour at Nara Park & then, get transferred to the drop-off point. From there, return to the hotel on your own for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Osaka Walking Tour
activities: Today, head to the meeting point-Osaka Tourist Information Center on your own. Wander through the Shinsekai & Hozenji Yokocho streets, filled with local eateries. Next, visit the historic Hozenji Temple & later, explore the Dotonbori District, a popular area for its vibrant signage and street food options like takoyaki and okonomiyaki. The tour ends at Ebisu Bridge, a well-known spot offering views of Dotonbori. After that, you can explore Osaka on your own, visiting various sites.

itinerary.day: Day 7 Day at Leisure
activities: Today, enjoy the day exploring Osaka at your own pace. You can visit the Miraiza Osaka-jo, a historic commercial complex originally built in 1931 as the headquarters of the Imperial Japanese Army’s Fourth Division. You can also stroll through the streets of Shinsekai and visit the Hokoku Shrine. In the evening, you can head to Abeno Harukas, a towering 300-meter skyscraper, and marvel at the breathtaking cityscape from its observation deck, among several other attraction points.

itinerary.day: Day 8 Departure Day
activities: In the morning, pack your bags full of memorable adventures. Check out of the hotel, and get transferred to Kansai International Airport, where your trip comes to an end.

packages.title: Japan -9 Days 8 Night
packages.subTitle: Couple & Family Oriented Tour Package
exclusions: Lunch or Dinner (Dinner - Except Day 1 or Day 3)

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Tokyo | Day at Leisure
activities: Welcome to Tokyo! Upon arrival at Narita International Airport, get transferred to your hotel. Check in and spend the day at your leisure. You can begin your tour by exploring Ginza, Tokyo's renowned upscale shopping district. Next, you can visit the Samurai Theater in Tokyo, which features a wide collection of historical armour. Afterwards, you can explore other sites such as Yoyogi Park, Sumida Park & Omotesando, among other attraction points.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Tokyo Sightseeing Tour by Bus
activities: Today, head to the pick-up point- LOVE Sculpture & board your transfer for the city tour. Visit Meiji Jingu Shrine, Tokyo Tower, & Tokyo Skytree followed by a stop at Imperial Palace, the historic centre of Japan's royal family. Next, explore Senso-ji Temple, Tokyo’s oldest temple, & head to Odaiba District, a vibrant area known for various shopping & dining options. After the tour, get driven to 1-chōme-7-2 Nishishinjuku, Shinjuku City, from where you can return to the hotel on your own.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Day Trip To Mount Fuji- 5th Station & Hakone
activities: Today, head to the pickup point- Giulio Paolini Sculpture: Kaleidoscorpio & from there, get driven to iconic Mt. Fuji's 5th Station. Once there, admire views of Fuji Five Lakes & the stunning surroundings. Next, embark on an exciting Hakone ropeway ride, offering views as you ascend towards Owakudani Valley, a volcanic region with bubbling sulfur springs & active vents. Afterwards, get driven to Odawara Station to board the bullet train to Tokyo. From there, return to the hotel on your own.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Day Trip to Disneyland
activities: Prepare for an exciting full-day adventure at Tokyo Disneyland. Begin by getting driven to the park, where you'll explore its seven themed zones, such as World Bazaar, Tomorrowland, Adventureland, and Fantasyland, home to the iconic Cinderella Castle. Enjoy classic attractions like Space Mountain, Pirates of the Caribbean, and It's a Small World, along with vibrant parades and breathtaking fireworks. After an unforgettable day, you'll be driven back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Arrival in Osaka | Day at Leisure
activities: After checking out of your hotel in Tokyo, head to Tokyo Station on your own and board the Shinkansen bullet train (tickets included) to Osaka. Upon arrival, make your way to the hotel on your own. Check in and spend the day at leisure. You can relax in the scenic Tennoji Park or head to the Umeda Sky Building to capture stunning city views. You can also visit Osaka Castle or the Shitennō-ji Temple, among many other attractions.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Osaka Walking Tour | Leisure Time
activities: Today, head to the Osaka Tourist Information Center to begin your Osaka walking tour. Begin with the Shinsekai district, known for its retro charm and local dining spots. Continue to Hozenji Yokocho, a quaint alley that houses the Hozenji Temple. Next, stroll through the lively Dotonbori District, ending the tour at Ebisu Bridge, offering scenic views of the bustling Dotonbori Canal. Afterward, you can explore Osaka on your own, visiting places like the Osaka Museum of History & Umeda District.

itinerary.day: Day 7 Day Trip to Kyoto & Nara
activities: Today, head to Namba OCAT Building for your Kyoto & Nara tour. Begin with a visit to the iconic Kinkaku-ji Temple in Kyoto, renowned for its picturesque gardens and ponds. Next, travel to Nara to explore Nara Park, where you can interact with friendly deer. Further, visit the historic Todai-ji Temple, home to the colossal Great Buddha statue, a masterpiece of Japanese heritage. After the tour, get driven to the Namba OCAT Building and make your way back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 8 Day Trip to Universal Studios
activities: Today, get driven to the Universal Studios, a world of adventure and entertainment. Explore its vibrant themed zones, including the Minion Park, the prehistoric wonders of Jurassic Park and the Universal Wonderland. Step into The Wizarding World of Harry Potter to experience the magic of Hogwarts & feel the adrenaline on thrilling rides like The Flying Dinosaur and Jurassic Park: The Ride. After a fun filled day, get driven back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 9 Departure Day
activities: Today, check out of the hotel and get transferred to Kansai International Airport, where your trip comes to an end.

packages.title: Japan -13 Days 12 Night
packages.subTitle: Couple & Family Oriented Tour Package
exclusions: Lunch or Dinner (Dinner - Except Day 1 or Day 3)

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Tokyo | Day at Leisure
activities: Welcome to Tokyo! Upon arriving at the airport, you'll be transferred to the hotel. After you relax for some time, you can explore the city at your leisure. You may visit Ginza, a hub of shopping & entertainment options or spend time at Sumida Park, offering a peaceful escape from the rush of the city. If you wish, you can also visit Samurai Theatre & enjoy live performances or walk on the famous Rainbow Bridge, offering views of the beautiful Tokyo Bay. Later, return to the hotel on your own.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Tokyo Sightseeing Tour by Bus
activities: In the morning, head to LOVE Sculpture, the meeting point for the Tokyo city tour. Board the transfer & get driven to the first stop—Meiji Jingu Shrine, famed for its peaceful atmosphere. Then, explore the Imperial Palace, the seat of Japan’s monarchy & Senso Ji Temple, the oldest temple in Tokyo. Continue to Tokyo Skytree for amazing city views, followed by a stop at Odaiba, a shopping & entertainment district. Later, get driven to 1-chōme-7-2 Nishishinjuku & from there, head back to the hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Excursion to Mt. Fuji – 5th Station & Hakone
activities: From your hotel, head to Giulio Paolini Sculpture: "Kaleidoscorpio" & board the transfer to Mt. Fuji's 5th Station, Japan’s iconic peak. Upon reaching, be amazed by panoramic views of the surroundings. Next, enjoy a Hakone ropeway ride, offering stunning Lake Ashi & Mt. Fuji views as you ascend to Owakudani Valley, an active volcanic area famous for its sulfur vents & hot springs. Later, head to Odawara Station to board a Shinkansen bullet train to Tokyo Station. From there, head back to the hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Day Trip to Tokyo Disneyland
activities: Today, get ready to enjoy a magical day at Disneyland. You will board your transfer from your hotel to Disneyland. Explore the themed lands, from fairy-tale castles, and enjoy the thrilling rides of Space Mountain and It's a Small World, Monsters, Inc. Ride & Go Seek, and Beauty & the Beast. Meet the beloved Disney characters and watch the spectacular parades and live shows. After that, get transferred back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Day Trip to Tokyo Disneysea
activities: In the morning, get ready for an adventure at Disney Sea. Head to Tokyo Disney Sea on your own. Start your adventure by exploring the only sea-themed Disney theme park. Experience the beauty of themed ports, enjoy thrilling rides, watch live shows, and meet your favorite Disney characters. Explore its seven themed ports with immersive themes, attractions, and dining options. After the visit, head back to the hotel at your own pace for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Day at Leisure
activities: Take the day to explore the city at your own pace. You may visit Tokyo National Museum, housing one of the largest collections of art & artefacts in the country. Alternatively, you may visit Shinjuku Gyoen, a beautiful combination of traditional Japanese, English, and French gardens. If you wish, you can also visit Mode Gakuen Cocoon Tower, a modern hub for fashion & design education. Later, return to the hotel on your own for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 7 Transfer to Hiroshima | Day at Leisure
activities: Post-checkout, head to Tokyo Station to board the bullet train to Hiroshima. Upon arrival, head to your hotel and check-in. You can spend the rest of the day at leisure. You can visit Shukkeien Garden, which is designed in a circuit style with a central pond, hills, tea houses, and bridges. Alternatively, you can visit Hiroshima Castle, also known as the "Carp Castle," where you can explore its beautiful grounds and climb to the top for panoramic city view

itinerary.day: Day 8 Hiroshima & Miyajima Island Sightseeing Tour
activities: Head to the pickup point- Hotel Granvia on your own for your Hiroshima & Miyajima tour. Begin with a visit to Peace Memorial Park, a significant symbol of hope & peace. Next, marvel at the Atomic Bomb Dome, a powerful reminder of Hiroshima’s tragic history. Then, take a ferry to Miyajima Island, where you’ll see the iconic Itsukushima Shrine & its vermillion-red floating torii gates. Later, get transferred to the drop-off point, Hiroshima Station & from there, head back to the hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 9 Transfer to Osaka | Day at Leisure
activities: After you check out of your hotel in Hiroshima, head to Hiroshima Station on your own for a bullet train journey to Osaka. Upon arrival, head to the hotel and check-in. Later, you can explore the city at your leisure. You can visit the Osaka Museum of House & Living, letting you explore the city’s history and development. Alternatively, you can visit the Osaka Science Museum, featuring various hands-on exhibits and interactive displays.

itinerary.day: Day 10 Day Trip to Kyoto & Nara
activities: Head to the pick-up point, Namba Ocat Building & board the transfer for a day trip to Kyoto & Nara. Upon arrival in Kyoto, visit Kinkakuji Temple, known for its gold leaf-covered exterior. Then, explore Arashiyama bamboo forest, offering a peaceful escape from the city's rush. Continue to Nara Park, where you can interact with Sika deer & visit Todai-ji Temple, home to Japan’s largest bronze Buddha statue. Later, get driven to the drop-off point & from there, head to the hotel on your own.

itinerary.day: Day 11 Osaka Walking Tour
activities: In the morning, head to the Osaka Tourist Information Center for the walking tour. Begin by exploring Shinsekai & Hozenji Yokocho streets, where you can try traditional Japanese street food. Next, visit Hozenji Temple & marvel at the iconic Fudo Myoo statue. Afterwards, visit Dotonbori, Osaka's most vibrant and iconic district, known for its vibrant atmosphere, ending the tour at Ebisu Bridge. Later, you can explore Osaka at your own pace before you unwind for the day.

itinerary.day: Day 12 Day Trip to Universal Studios
activities: Today, get ready & board your transfer for Universal Studios, home to ten captivating zones of entertainment. Upon arrival, you can begin your adventure with the amazing Hollywood Dream—The Ride, a roller coaster that lets you feel the rush of flying. Explore the vibrant Minion Park, where the mischievous Minions create a world of laughter and fun. Dive into the prehistoric thrills of Jurassic Park, featuring heart-pounding dinosaur encounters. Afterwards, get transferred back to the hotel.

itinerary.day: Departure Day
activities: In the morning, check out of the hotel. Get transferred from the hotel to Osaka International Airport, where your trip comes to an end.

packages.title: Japan - 6 Days 5 Night
packages.subTitle: Couple & Family Oriented Tour Package
exclusions: Lunch or Dinner (Dinner - Except Day 1 or Day 3)

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Tokyo | Day at Leisure
activities: Welcome to Japan! Upon arrival at the Narita International Airport, get driven to your hotel in Tokyo. Post check-in, spend the rest of your day at your leisure, where you can relax or explore the city on your own. You can take a leisurely walk through the lush greenery of Yoyogi Park or visit Sumida Park & soak-in the views of the Sumida River and Tokyo Skytree. Also, you can indulge in shopping in the Ginza district & more. Afterwards, return to your hotel for an overnight stay

itinerary.day: Day 2 Tokyo Sightseeing Tour
activities: In the morning, head to Matsuya Ginza to board the bus to explore Tokyo on a sightseeing tour. Make your first stop to visit the Meiji Shrine, nestled in a lush forest. Next, admire the impressive architecture of the Imperial Palace. Continue your tour and visit Sensō-ji, Tokyo’s oldest Buddhist temple with rich historical significance. Also, visit other key attractions in the city before getting driven to Matsuya Ginza. Once there, return to the hotel on your own for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Day Trip To Mount Fuji and Hakone
activities: Today, head to Shinjuku Love on your own and board your transfer to the majestic Mount Fuji. Upon arrival, ascend to the Subaru Line 5th Station and soak-in the breathtaking vistas of Japan’s highest mountain. Next, enjoy a scenic boat ride on Lake Ashi, followed by a thrilling ropeway journey in Hakone. Also, witness the bubbling hot springs in the Owakudani Valley. Later, get driven to Odawara Station and board your bullet train to Tokyo Station. From there, return to your hotel on your own.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Arrival in Osaka | Day at Leisure
activities: Today, after check-out, head to Tokyo Station on your own and board the Shinkansen bullet train to Osaka (tickets provided). Upon reaching Osaka, head to your hotel and check-in. Spend the rest of your day at leisure, where you can relax or explore the city on your own. You can visit the Osaka Museum of History to uncover the city's past or enjoy the hands-on exhibits at the Osaka Science Museum. Also, you can get a taste of vibrant local culture at Den Den Town. Later, return to your hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Day trip to Kyoto and Nara
activities: In the morning, head to the pick-up point at Hearton Hotel Nishiumeda on your own and board your transfer for a full-day trip to Kyoto and Nara. Start with a visit to the famous Kinkakuji Temple and admire its stunning architecture. Proceed to explore the historical Nijo Castle and visit the impressive Todaiji Temple. Next, enjoy the company of friendly deer in Nara Park, explore the Arashiyama District and more. Later, get driven to Hearton Hotel Nishiumeda and from there, return to your hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Departure Day
activities: Today, after check-out, board your transfer for Narita International Airport. Upon reaching, board your flight back home, marking the end of your unforgettable Japan tour!

destinations.highlight: We’ve proudly served over 1 lakh happy customers with our Singapore tour packages – and their satisfaction speaks for itself.
destinations.about: At Tripdekhoo, we prioritize exceptional customer service and seamless experiences. From hotels, visas, and flights to sightseeing and end-to-end transfers, we take care of everything so you can travel stress-free.

packages.title: Malaysia- 4 Days 3 Night
packages.subTitle: Couple & Family Oriented Tour Package
exclusions: Lunch or Dinner (Dinner - Except Day 1 or Day 3)

itinerary.day: Day 1 Welcome to Malaysia
activities: Upon arrival at Kuala Lumpur International Airport, you’ll be transferred to your hotel for check-in. Take some time to relax and spend your day at leisure. You can visit the iconic Petronas Twin Towers, for stunning city views and admire the historic Merdeka Square and National Monument for their Moorish architecture. Explore the rich heritage of Islamic art at Islamic Arts Museum before heading to KL Tower, world's seventh-tallest tower. Later, return to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Kuala Lumpur City Tour
activities: Today, get transferred to KL Tower for beautiful views of the city skyline. Next, visit Istana Negara, the regal National Palace, steeped in Malaysian heritage. Pay tribute to fallen heroes at Tugu Negara, the poignant National Monument and marvel at the intricate Moorish architecture of Sultan Abdul Samad Building. Indulge in the flavors of Malaysia at Cocoa Boutique and lastly, reflect at the serene National Mosque, a modern marvel of Islamic architecture. Later, get driven to your hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Sunway Lagoon Theme Park | Thrills and Chills
activities: Prepare yourself for an action-packed day by getting driven to Sunway Lagoon. Dive into the water park inspired by Africa, featuring 13 attractions and a surf beach, then brace yourself for scares at Scream Park's horror theatre. Enjoy exciting rides at the Amusement Park or satisfy your adventurous spirit at Extreme Park with activities like paintball and rock climbing. You can also try thrilling water slides like Cameroon Climb and African Python before getting transferred to your hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Departure
activities: In the morning, check-out from your hotel and get transferred to the airport, marking an end to your fun-filled trip.

packages.title: Malaysia -5 Days 4 Night
packages.subTitle: Couple & Family Oriented Tour Package
exclusions: Lunch or Dinner (Dinner - Except Day 1 or Day 3)

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Kuala Lumpur
activities: Welcome to Malaysia! Upon arrival at Kuala Lumpur International Airport, you will be transferred to your pre-booked hotel. Upon checking in and settling into your room, spend the remainder of the day at your leisure. Wander through the vibrant streets, marvel at the city's charming architecture, and soak in the scenic views of Kuala Lumpur. You can visit the KL Tower or head to MinNature Malaysia. Later, you will return to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Kuala Lumpur City Tour | Visit to Petronas Twin Towers
activities: In the morning, you will be driven for a city tour of Kuala Lumpur. Marvel at the towering KL Tower, dive into the history at Tugu Negara, and admire the architectural beauty of the National Mosque of Malaysia. Next, you'll be transferred to the Petronas Twin Towers for stunning panoramic views of the city skyline. From historic temples to modern skyscrapers, enjoy the rich cultural tapestry of Malaysia's vibrant capital. After the tour, you'll be driven to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Day Trip to Sunway Lagoon Park
activities: Today, you will be driven to Sunway Lagoon Park for an exciting day (tickets included). Dive into the Water Park's wave pools and thrilling slides or explore the wildlife park area to encounter exotic animals. Experience the Scream Park's haunted attractions and head to the Amusement Park with rides for all ages for a fun time. It's a day packed with excitement and adventure for everyone. Afterwards, you will be driven back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Day at Leisure
activities: Enjoy a relaxing slow morning at the hotel. Today is yours to explore Kuala Lumpur at your own pace. You can indulge in some shopping at Bukit Bintang, visit the cultural sites, or simply relax and enjoy the hotel's amenities. Consider visiting the vibrant Chinatown or the peaceful KL Forest Eco Park. The day is yours to create unforgettable memories. Later, you will return to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Departure Day
activities: In the morning, get ready to check out from the hotel. You will be transferred from the hotel to the airport in Langkawi. Board your flight back home and take a bag full of memories with you.

packages.title: Malaysia -7 Days 6 Night
packages.subTitle: scape to Singapore & Malaysia with Genting Highlands
exclusions: Lunch or Dinner (Dinner - Except Day 1 or Day 3)

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Singapore | Leisure Day
activities: Welcome to Singapore! Upon arrival at the airport, get transferred to the hotel and check in. You can relax for the day or set out to explore Singapore at your own pace. Singapore Zoo, Bukit Batok Nature Park, and Changi Beach Park are some attractions you can visit. Also, go shopping at Orchard Road and try local delicacies at Little India. Later, return to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Singapore Half-day Tour
activities: In the morning, board your transfer for a sightseeing tour of Singapore. Visit iconic attractions of the city including Merlion Park, Helix Bridge, ArtScience Museum, and Marina Bay. Take a stroll through the vibrant Chinatown, indulge in shopping at Civic District or Suntec City, and pay your respects at the Civilian War Memorial. Later, get transferred back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Day Trip to Sentosa Island | Madame Tussauds Visit
activities: Today, get transferred to Mount Faber for a cable car ride to Sentosa Island. Upon reaching, visit Madame Tussauds Wax Museum and rub shoulders with your favourite celebrities like Ed Sheeran, Virat Kohli, Dua Lipa, and more. You can also enjoy other attractions at the island like Adventure Cove Waterpark, S.E.A. Aquarium, and Fort Siloso (at an extra cost). Later, take your cable car back to the cable car station at Mount Faber and get transferred to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Transfer to Kuala Lumpur | Leisure Day
activities: Check out and board your transfer to Singapore Changi Airport, an award winning 10-storey airport, known for its beautiful attractions like HSBC Rain Vortex, Butterfly Garden, and Canopy Park. Enjoy your time at the airport as you wait for your flight to Kuala Lumpur (flight tickets not included). Upon arrival, get transferred to the hotel, check in and rest. You can also explore the city by visiting the KL Bird Park and Pavillion KL. Later, return to the hotel by yourself for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Kuala Lumpur Half-day Tour
activities: Get ready for an assisted sightseeing tour of Kuala Lumpur. Marvel at the tallest twin towers in the world, the Petronas Towers and admire the golden domes of Istana Negara, official residence of the King of Malaysia, also called the King’s Palace. Next, visit the Sultan Abdul Samad Building, the government office of Malaysia, dating back to the 19th century. Pay homage to Malaysia's war heroes at Tugu Negara, a national monument. Later, get transferred back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Day Trip to Genting Highlands | Batu Caves Visit
activities: Today, board your transfer to the Awana Skyway and take a cable car ride to Genting Highlands. Upon reaching, you can explore the amusement parks, bars, and restaurants (at an extra cost) or shop for souvenirs to take back home. Also, try your luck at the casinos (at your expense). Then, get ready to explore the Batu Caves and admire the 140-feet tall statue of Lord Murugan. Later, take your cable car ride back to the Awana SkyWay and get transferred to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 7 Departure Day
activities: Enjoy your breakfast and check out of the hotel. Then, board your transfer to Kuala Lumpur International Airport for your departure flight. This is where your trip comes to an end. Have a safe journey ahead!

packages.title: Malaysia - 9 Days 8 Nights
packages.subTitle: Couple & Family Oriented Tour Package
exclusions: Lunch or Dinner (Dinner - Except Day 1 or Day 3)

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Singapore | Visit to Night Safari Zoo
activities: Welcome to Singapore! Upon arrival, you'll be transferred to your hotel for check in. Later, in the evening, get driven to the world's first nocturnal zoo, Night Safari Zoo, where you can walk through 7 unique trails, and enjoy a fire dance show and animal show. Watch creatures like White African Lion, and Tasmanian Devil, showcase their talents in the famous Creatures of the Night show. Later, get transferred back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Singapore Sightseeing Tour | Leisure Day
activities: In the morning, you’ll be driven for a sightseeing tour of Singapore, starting with attractions such as Merlion Park, Chinatown, and Plaza Singapura. Walk across the world’s largest double Helix Bridge and admire the unique lotus-shaped architecture of the ArtScience Museum before getting driven back to the hotel. Later, you can explore the city on your own and visit places like Singapore Zoo, Gardens By The Bay and River Wonder. Later, return to your hotel on your own for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Day Trip Sentosa Island | Visit to Madame Tussauds & Wings of Time Show
activities: In the morning, board your transfer for a day trip to Sentosa Island. Take a cable car ride from the Mount Faber Station, straight to the island, offering panoramic views of Singapore. Once you reach, explore Madame Tussauds, where you can see lifelike wax figures of celebrities. Enjoy the scenic Skyride at the Skyline Luge. Then, as evening falls, be captivated by the Wings of Time laser show by the sea. After a fulfilling day, get transferred back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Day Trip to Universal Studios
activities: Today, get ready to board your transfer from the hotel to the Universal Studios. Enjoy 28 thrilling rides and attractions that bring your favourite movies to life. Explore the seven zones: Hollywood, Sci-Fi City, New York, Ancient Egypt, Lost World, Madagascar, and Far Far Away. Don’t miss the ‘Hollywood Dreams Light Up Parade,’ featuring themed floats, characters, and performers. As the day ends, return to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Transfer to Langkawi | Langkawi Sky Bridge & 6D Cinemotion
activities: In the morning, head to the airport for your flight to Langkawi. Check in at the hotel and relax for a while. Later, you’ll be dropped at the Langkawi Cable Car from where you can take a scenic cable car ride to Machinchang Mountain. A curved bridge suspended high above the lush rainforest, the Sky Bridge offers spectacular views of Malaysia’s Langkawi archipelago. Later, head to the 6D Cinemotion for an immersive adventure before getting transferred back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Langkawi Island Sightseeing Tour
activities: Today, your Langkawi Island tour starts at Underwater World, Malaysia's largest aquarium, showcasing over 4,000 marine species and a 15-metre-long tunnel walkway. Head to Kuah Town or you can visit Atma Alam to see traditional batik art. Visit Eagle Square, featuring a 12-metre-tall eagle statue overlooking the bay. Later, explore the Gamat Factory and learn about Gamat, a special sea creature known for its medicinal properties before getting driven back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 7 Transfer to Kuala Lumpur | Sightseeing Tour
activities: In the morning, check out of the hotel in Langkawi and get transferred to Kuala Lumpur. Post check in, relax for a while before heading out for a city sightseeing tour. Visit Sultan Abdul Samad Building followed by the National Mosque Of Malaysia. Continue to Tugu Negara, and pay your respects to the heroes. You can also explore Buckingham Palace, the King's Palace, and Istana Negara. Later, in the evening, get transferred back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 8 Day Trip to Genting Highlands and Batu Caves
activities: Today, get transferred to Genting Highlands. Take a cable car ride from Awana SkyWay to reach the highlands. Once at the top, explore a variety of amusement parks, and shops that cater to all ages. Try your luck at the Genting Casino for an exciting experience. Later, take your cable car ride back to the station for a transfer back to the hotel. On the way, visit Batu Caves and admire the 140-foot-tall statue of Lord Murugan. After this, reach your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 9 Departure Day
activities: In the morning, check out of the hotel. Then, board your transfer to Kuala Lumpur International Airport. This is where your trip comes to an end.

packages.title: Bali- 6 Days 5 Night
packages.subTitle: Couple & Family Oriented Tour Package
exclusions: Lunch or Dinner (Dinner - Except Day 1 or Day 3)

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Ubud | Day at Leisure
activities: Welcome to Bali! Upon arrival at Ngurah Rai Airport, get transferred to your hotel in Ubud. Post check in, spend the rest of your day at leisure, where you can relax or explore the city on your own. You can visit the ancient Goa Gajah Temple, known for its intricate cave carvings, & you can witness a stunning collection of exotic birds at the Bali Bird Park. Also, you can indulge in thrilling rides at Waterbom Waterpark, Bali's top water park before returning to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Kintamani Highlighlands with Tegallalang Rice Terraces & Tegenungan Waterfall
activities: In the morning, board your transfer to explore Central Bali. Start with a visit to the stunning Tegenungan Waterfall and admire the lush Tegallalang Rice Terraces, renowned for their amazing tiered beauty. Proceed to Kintamani Highlands and soak-in the breathtaking views of Mount Batur and its caldera. Also, experience the rich flavors of Luwak coffee (at an extra cost) and enjoy the exhilarating Bali Swing for an unforgettable thrill. Later, get transferred to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Transfer to Kuta | Bali Temple Tour with Monkey Forest
activities: Today, after checking out from your hotel, get driven to Alas Kedaton Monkey Forest, a serene sanctuary, and observe playful long-tailed macaques in their natural habitat. Next, visit the iconic Tanah Lot Temple, perched atop a dramatic sea rock formation, and soak-in the stunning coastal views. Continue to Taman Ayun Temple, a beautiful royal temple known for its scenic gardens and stunning sunset views. Later, get transferred to your hotel in Kuta for check-in and a comfortable overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 South Bali Sightseeing Tour
activities: Today, board your transfer to Tanjung Benoa Beach, offering an exciting range of water sports. Once there, dive into thrilling activities like jet skiing, parasailing, and banana boat rides amidst a lively atmosphere. Then, visit the iconic Uluwatu Temple, perched dramatically on a cliff 70 meters above sea level and one of Bali's six key sea temples. Also, marvel at its intricate architecture and soak-in its peaceful atmosphere. Later, get driven to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Nusa Penida West Tour
activities: In the morning, get transferred to Sanur Harbor and board a speedboat to Nusa Penida. Start by visiting Kelingking Beach, renowned for its T-Rex-shaped cliff, and soak-in the stunning views. Next, explore Angel’s Billabong, a natural infinity pool with crystal-clear waters and continue to Broken Bay, where a breathtaking natural arch offers incredible coastal views. Also, enjoy snorkeling at Bubu Beach, famous for its vibrant marine life, before returning to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Departure Day
activities: Today, after check-out from the hotel in Kuta, board your transfer to the Ngurah Rai International Airport. This marks the end of your amazing Bali trip!

packages.title: Bali -8 Days 7 Night
packages.subTitle: Couple & Family Oriented Tour Package
exclusions: Lunch or Dinner (Dinner - Except Day 1 or Day 3)

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Ubud | Leisure Day
activities: Upon arriving at Bali's airport, you'll be greeted and transferred to your hotel for check-in. After settling in, you have the option to either relax and unwind or embark on a captivating exploration of Ubud. Discover the enchanting Ubud Monkey Forest, delve into the historical intrigue of Goa Gajah, wander through the serene Ubud Water Palace, or catch a show at Paradiso. After a day of adventure, return to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Central Bali Sightseeing Tour
activities: Today, you'll embark on a sightseeing tour of Central Bali, with a convenient transfer from your hotel. Your journey will take you to the stunning Tegenungan Waterfall, the Kintamani Highlands, and Tegallalang Rice Terraces. Take the opportunity to savour the unique Luwak coffee (at an additional cost) and experience the thrill of a ride on the renowned Bali Swing. After a day filled with exploration and adventure, you'll be transferred back to your hotel for a comfortable overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Bedugul Sightseeing Tour
activities: Today, board your transfer from the hotel for an assisted sightseeing tour of some of Bali's iconic attractions. Capture amazing photos at the Handara Gate with the views of Mt. Batur. Visit Ulun Danu Beratan Temple, a temple dedicated to the goddess of the lake, Dewi Danu. Later, witness the sunset at Tanah Lot temple, located amidst the Indian Ocean. After that, get transferred to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Transfer to Kuta | Visit to Bali Safari & Marine Park
activities: Check out from your Ubud hotel and transfer to Kuta, where you'll check in at your new hotel. Later, embark on a pre-booked transfer to the Bali Safari and Marine Park. Enjoy an exciting safari adventure and encounter over 100 wildlife species, including hippos, rhinos, binturongs, Komodo dragons, and tigers. After a day of wildlife exploration, you'll be transferred back to your hotel in Kuta for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Excursion to Serangan Island
activities: Embark on a thrilling adventure as you get transferred to Tanjung Benoa Beach and board a glass-bottom boat for a scenic ride to Serangan Island. Spot colourful fish and even sea turtles through the clear floor. Soak up the sun and explore the island's charm at your own pace. Head to the Turtle Conservation and Education Center for an informative session. Also, enjoy water sports like jet skiing (at your own cost) at the beach. Later, get transferred to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 6 South Bali Sightseeing Tour
activities: On this day, board your transfer from the hotel for a sightseeing tour of South Bali. Enjoy an assisted drive to the beautiful Padang Padang Beach and take a stroll along the shoreline upon reaching there. Explore the majestic Uluwatu Temple, a cliffside Hindu temple known for its captivating architecture and traditional Kecak dance performances held at sunset (at an extra cost). Later, get transferred to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 7 Leisure Day
activities: Spend this day by exploring Kuta at your own pace. You can visit attractions like Kuta Square, New Kuta Green Park, Pura Petitenget Temple, etc. In the evening, you may head to the Kuta Night Market, Kuta Art Market, Mal Bali Galeria, and more. Later, return to the hotel on your own for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 8 Departure Day
activities: After breakfast, check-out from the hotel and get transferred to the Bali Airport. This is where your trip ends. Have a safe journey ahead!

You can explore the Ubud Royal Palace, known for its traditional Balinese architecture. Next, visit Tirta Empul Temple, a 10th-century water temple where locals engage in purification rituals. Experience the thrill of the Bali Swing, offering stunning views over the tropical landscape. Later, get transferred to your hotel for an overnight stay.

Later, you'll be transferred to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Excursion to Nusa Penida Island
activities: In the morning, transfer from your hotel to Sanur Harbor and board a speedboat to Nusa Penida. You can explore Kelingking Beach, famous for its T-Rex-shaped cliff. Next, visit Angel’s Billabong, a natural infinity pool with crystal-clear waters formed by volcanic rock. Continue to Broken Bay, where you'll see a stunning natural arch. packages.title: Bali - 7 Days 6 Nights
packages.subTitle: Couple & Family Oriented Tour Package

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Ubud | Leisure Day
activities: Welcome to Bali! Upon arrival at the airport, you’ll be transferred to your hotel in Ubud. Check in and spend the rest of the day at your leisure. You can explore Ubud on your own, with highlights including the serene Bali Park and the intriguing Goa Gajah (Elephant Cave). If time allows, experience the fun and excitement at Waterbom Waterpark. Later, return to your hotel for a relaxing overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Central Bali Sightseeing Tour
activities: Today, get driven for Central Bali sightseeing tour. Discover the Kintamani Highlands, offering stunning views of the active Mount Batur and its volcanic lake. Also, see the Tegallalang Rice Terraces showcasing Bali’s traditional rice cultivation with their intricate, verdant layers. Capture the stunning Tegenungan Waterfall and take a thrilling ride on the Bali Swing, gliding high above the lush jungle. Afterwards, get driven back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Bedugul Sightseeing Tour with Tanah Lot Temple
activities: Begin your day by getting transferred to visit Bali’s iconic Handara Gate, renowned for its grand, intricately carved entrance—an iconic landmark known for its intricate Balinese design and lush backdrop, often considered one of the most photographed spots in Bali. Also, visit the sacred Ulun Danu Temple, located by Lake Beratan. Conclude at Tanah Lot Temple, perched on a volcanic rock formation, renowned for its stunning ocean sunsets. Later, get driven back to the hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Day Trip to Bali Safari and Marine Park
activities: Today, you’ll be transferred to Bali Safari and Marine Park, home to over 1,000 exotic animals. Encounter the unique Binturong, often called a bearcat, with its fox-like face and monkey-like tail. Experience a tram safari through the park, explore the fascinating freshwater aquarium, and enjoy engaging animal presentations. Watch the captivating Bali Agung Show and cool off at the Water Play Zone with its fun water rides. Later, get transferred back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Arrival in Kuta | Excursion to Nusa Penida Island
activities: Today, check out and board the transfer to your hotel in Kuta. After checking in, you'll be driven to Sanur Harbor for a shared speedboat ride to Nusa Penida Island. Explore the stunning Kelingking Beach with its dramatic cliff formations, and marvel at Angel’s Billabong, a natural infinity pool. Take a stroll along Bubu Beach and see the striking Broken Bay. After a day of island exploration, get transferred back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Balinese Spa Experience | Leisure Day
activities: On this day, get transferred for a relaxing Balinese spa experience. Enjoy the relaxing massage, where traditional treatments and healing therapies are combined to deliver the ultimate relaxation experience. Then, board your transfer back to the hotel in Kuta. Later, you can explore Kuta by visiting sites like Kuta Theater and Kuta Square. You can even opt for a sunset dinner cruise (at an extra cost). Later, return to the hotel on your own for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 7 Departure
activities: In the morning, check out from the hotel and get driven to the airport for your flight back home.

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Almaty
activities: Welcome to Almaty – City of thousand colors! After your arrival at the Almaty International Airport, you will be driven to your pre-booked hotel.
You can relax at the hotel or head out to explore the colorful city on your own.
You can visit the Zelyony Bazaar, Abai Square, and more such places to explore the local culture, cuisine, and crafts.
Later, you will return to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Almaty City Tour
activities: Today, you will be driven to Panfilov Park, where you will explore the beautiful green space and visit the iconic Zenkov Cathedral, a marvel of wood architecture.
In the afternoon, you will visit Republic Square, enjoy the view of the Independence Monument, and capture a beautiful sunset in the backdrop.
After your full day exploration, you will be driven back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Day Trip to Medeu Ice Skating Rink and Shymbulak Ski Resort
activities: In the morning, you will board your transfer to Medeu, feeling the adrenaline rush as you skate at one of the largest alpine rinks.
Next, you will experience a scenic cable car ride to the Shymbulak Ski Resort.
Located at an altitude of about 2,200 meters, Shymbulak offers breathtaking views of snow-capped peaks and pristine valleys, providing a perfect backdrop for relaxation and rejuvenation.

activities: Board your transfer to the Green Bazaar, where you can enjoy a shopping spree for souvenirs, clothes, and local snacks.

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Almaty
activities: In the evening, board your flight from Delhi International Airport to Almaty.
Once you reach Almaty International Airport, you’ll be transferred to your hotel.
After checking-in, relax for a while and later you can head out to explore the city by visiting Zelyony Bazaar, Abai Square, or the Palace of President and the Palace of Republic.
You can even take a leisurely walk on the streets before returning back to your hotel on your own for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Almaty Sightseeing Tour
activities: Today, spend your day exploring Almaty on a sightseeing tour.
Start with Panfilov Park, dedicated to the Panfilov heroes who defended Moscow during World War II, and head towards the Zenkov Cathedral, a Russian Orthodox wooden Church.
Next, continue your tour at Republic Square, to see the Independence Monument, a symbol of Kazakhstan's freedom.
Post the sightseeing tour, get transferred back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Day Trip to Medeu Ice Skating Rink & Shymbulak Ski Resort
activities: Enjoy a day filled with adventure on a day trip to Shymbulak Ski Resort.
Begin with a transfer to the world's largest high-mountain skating rink, Medeu, and witness the beauty of the Trans-Ili Alatau mountains while skiing and snowboarding.
Later, take a cable car ride to Shymbulak Ski Resort for skiing and snowboarding along the unparalleled views of the surrounding mountain peaks.
Conclude the day with a transfer back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Trip to Green Bazaar & Rahat Chocolate Factory | Visit to Kok Tobe Park
activities: Today, get transferred to discover the lively city of Almaty with a walk and shop through the bustling Green Bazaar, the oldest in Kazakhstan.
Next, visit the Rakhat Chocolate Factory, to learn about the history and production process of some of the finest chocolate in the world.
Next, board the cable car from the city centre to take in the views of Almaty from Kok Tobe's peak and visit the Fountain of Desires and Alley of Lovers.
Later, you’ll be transferred to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Day Trip to Issyk Lake
activities: Begin with a transfer to a scenic day trip from Almaty, as you pass through the lush forests to reach the Issyk Lake, located in the heart of the Ile Alatau mountains.
Upon arrival, enjoy a leisurely walk around the lake, taking in the stunning views and the serene surroundings.
Also, explore the rich history and cultural heritage of the region by visiting the State Historical and Cultural Museum-Reserve.
Post the trip, get transferred to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Departure Day
activities: It's time to say goodbye to this amazing place and head back home with a bag full of souvenirs, chocolates, and unforgettable memories.
Once you check out, board your transfer to Almaty Airport and get ready for your flight back to Delhi International Airport.
