itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Mauritius
activities: Welcome to the Paradise Island! Upon your arrival at Sir Seewoosagur Ramgoolam International Airport, you will be transferred to your pre-booked hotel.
Check-in and unwind in the serene surroundings of your hotel.
You can also choose to head out on your own to explore the island, visiting the lush SSR Botanical Gardens, snorkeling at the vibrant Balaclava Marine Park, or relax at the Balaclava Beach.
Later, head back to the hotel for a comfortable overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Ile aux Cerfs Day Tour
activities: In the morning, you will board your transfer and enjoy a full-day tour to the exquisite Île aux Cerfs.
Cruise through the crystal-clear waters via speed boat to this stunning island known for its sandy beaches and vibrant lagoon.
While you are at the island, you can enjoy various activities such as parasailing, tube ride, undersea walk (at extra cost), or simply bask in the sun on the beautiful beaches.
Afterwards, you will be driven back to your hotel for a comfortable overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 North Island Day Tour
activities: In the morning, you will embark on a tour of North part of the Paradise Island.

Your tour will start with the capital, Port Louis, where you will explore significant sites including the Fort Adelaide (Citadel), and the Aapravasi Ghat Museum, a UNESCO World Heritage site that is a testament to the history of labor migration.
After a full day of exploration, you will be driven back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 South Island Day Tour
activities: In the morning, you will be driven to the key attractions of the southern part of the island.
Start at the Valley of Colors, an adventure park built on an ancient volcanic site, offering activities like zip-lining and quad biking (additional costs apply).
Next, visit the Trou aux Cerfs, a dormant crater, and Grand Bassin, a sacred spot with a 108-foot Shiva statue and a holy lake.
After this full day tour, you will be driven back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Local Market Shopping Experience
activities: Today you will dedicate your day to exploring the local markets and shops of the island.
Head out to the Central Market in Port Louis and shop for souvenirs, discover local handicrafts, and sample traditional street food.
Spend the day strolling around the market and dive deep into the vibrant Mauritian culture.
Afterwards, you will head back to the hotel on your own for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Departure Day
activities: After checking out from the hotel, you will be driven to the airport for your flight back home.
This marks the end of your trip.

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Mauritius
activities: Welcome to the Paradise Island! Upon your arrival at Sir Seewoosagur Ramgoolam International Airport, you will be transferred to your pre-booked hotel.
Check-in and unwind at your hotel.
Later, you can choose to head out on your own to explore the island, visiting the SSR Botanical Gardens, Blue Bay Beach and more such places.
Later, head back to your hotel for a comfortable overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 North Island Day Tour
activities: You will board your transfer for a full day tour of North part of the Paradise Island.

Your tour will start with the capital, Port Louis, where you will visit the Fort Adelaide (Citadel), Le Caudan Waterfront, the Aapravasi Ghat Museum, a UNESCO World Heritage site, and other such attractions.
After a full day tour of exploring the island, you will be driven back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 South Island Day Tour
activities: In the morning, you will board your transfer for a full day tour of the southern part of the island.
Start at the Valley of Colors, an adventure park built on an ancient volcanic site, offering activities like zip-lining and quad biking (additional costs apply).
Next, visit the Trou aux Cerfs, a dormant crater, and Grand Bassin, a sacred spot with a 108-foot Shiva statue and a holy lake.
After this full day tour, you will be driven back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Ile aux Cerfs Day Tour
activities: After a relaxing morning at the hotel, you will board your transfer for a full-day tour to the exquisite Île aux Cerfs.
Cruise through the crystal-clear waters via speed boat to this stunning island known for its sandy beaches.
While you are at the island, you can enjoy various activities such as parasailing, snorkeling (at extra cost), or simply bask in the sun on the beautiful beaches.
Afterwards, you will be driven back to your hotel for a comfortable overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Local Market Shopping Experience
activities: Today you will dedicate your day to exploring the local markets and shops of the island.
Head out to the Central Market in Port Louis and shop for souvenirs, discover local handicrafts, and sample traditional street food.
Spend the day strolling around the market and dive deep into the vibrant Mauritian culture.
Afterwards, you will head back to the hotel on your own for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Tube Ride at Ile Aux Cerfs
activities: Today, you will spend the day at the Ile Aux Cerf.
You will board your transfer to the Pointe Maurice jetty on the east coast, and from there, travel to the islet by speedboat.
Remember to bring a swimsuit for a thrilling tube ride along the coast of Ile Aux Cerfs.
After a fun day in the water, you will be transferred back to your hotel via the Pointe Maurice jetty for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 7 Visit to Nepalese Bridge
activities: Board your transfer to the Vallee des Couleurs Nature Park (23 Coloured Earth Nature Park), known for its vibrant landscapes and adventure activities.
Enjoy the lush scenery as you walk across the iconic Nepalese Bridge, taking in panoramic views of the island's southern region.
After your visit, you will be driven back to the hotel for a comfortable overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 8 Leisure Day
activities: Today is yours to enjoy at leisure.
Spend your day relaxing on the private beach of your resort under the tropical sun.
Later, you can choose to explore the island on your own, visiting attractions such as Bel Ombre Beach and Frederica Nature Reserve.
After your adventures, you will return to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 9 Undersea Walk at Ile Aux Cerf
activities: In the morning, board your transfer for a visit to the exquisite Île aux Cerfs.
You'll cruise to the island by speed boat, renowned for its sandy beaches and crystal-clear waters.
Enjoy exploring the vibrant coral reefs and marine life with an exciting undersea walk.
Spend time basking in the sun on the beautiful beaches before being transferred back to your hotel for a comfortable overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 10 Departure Day
activities: After checking out from the hotel, you will be driven to the airport for your flight back home.
This marks the end of your trip.

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Mauritius | Welcome to the Paradise on Earth
activities: Welcome to Mauritius! Upon arrival at Mauritius airport, you will be transferred to your pre-booked resort.
Enroute, witness the captivating beauty of Mauritius’ vibrant streets.
After checking in at the resort, spend the rest of the day at leisure.
You can explore the beaches, stroll around the local markets, or simply relax at the hotel.
Later, you will return to the resort for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Mauritius South Day Tour | Discover Trou aux Cerfs
activities: Start your day by boarding the transfer for your South Day Tour of Mauritius.
You'll visit the Historic Marine, the largest ship model factory in Mauritius.
Next, head to Trou aux Cerfs, a dormant volcano offering panoramic views of the island.
Visit Grand Basin, a sacred crater lake for Hindus, & see the 33-meter tall statue of Lord Shiva.
Finally, visit Chamarel to marvel at the 7 Colored Earth, a unique natural phenomenon.
Afterwards, get transferred back to the resort for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Mauritius North Day Tour | Explore Port Louis
activities: In the morning, prepare for a North Island Tour of Mauritius.
You will be transferred to visit the Fort Adelaide for panoramic views of Port Louis and its harbor.
Explore the Central Market to experience local Mauritian life, followed by a visit to the Blue Penny Museum.
Visit the Champ de Mars racecourse, the oldest horse-racing club in the Southern Hemisphere.
Afterwards, you will be driven back to your hotel for a restful night.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Ile Aux Cerfs Tour by Speedboat | Adventure Awaits
activities: Today, you will be transferred to Trou d’Eau Douce for a speedboat ride to Ile aux Cerfs.
Enjoy various water activities such as parasailing, tube riding, and undersea walking (at an additional cost).
Snorkel to see the vibrant marine life and explore the beautiful beaches.
Next, visit the Grand River South East Waterfall, the largest waterfall in the region.
After an adventurous day, you will be driven back to the resort for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Departure Day
activities: In the morning, check out from the hotel and get driven to the airport for your flight back home.
Bid farewell with wonderful memories of your adventure in Mauritius.

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Mauritius | Welcome to the Tropical Paradise
activities: Welcome to the land of tropical islands, pristine beaches and coral reefs.
Upon arrival at the Mauritius airport, get transferred to your resort witnessing the charming beauty of the island en route.
After you reach the resort, check-in and relax your muscles.
Later, you can enjoy at the beautiful beaches in Mauritius like Tamarin & Blue Bay, visit the La Vanille Crocodile Park or simply rest at the hotel.
Afterwards, head back to your resort for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Full-Day Tour of North Mauritius | Get Historical Insights at Aapravasi Ghat
activities: Today, board your transfer for the Northern Mauritius tour starting at Cap-Malheureux for breathtaking views.
Then, visit SSR Botanic Garden, home to exotic plants.
Next, enjoy a Mauritian lunch before heading to Citadel Fort for panoramic views of Port Louis.
Later, explore Aapravasi Ghat, Le Caudan Waterfront, Le Craft Market and Central Market.
End your day at the Blue Penny Museum passing by Champ de Mars and Chinatown.
Afterwards, transfer back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Mauritius South West Day Tour | Explore Trou aux Cerfs
activities: In the morning, you'll be transferred for a Day Tour of South West Mauritius with a visit to Trou Aux Cerfs, a dormant volcano offering panoramic island views.
Then, explore Mare Aux Vacoas, the largest reservoir and Grand Bassin, a sacred lake with a giant Lord Shiva statue.
Next, marvel at Alexandra Falls in Black River Gorges and experience the vibrant hues of La Vallée des Couleurs Nature Park.
Finally, relax at scenic Gris Gris Beach before transferring to your resort for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Mauritius 5 Island Full day trip with Lunch
activities: Today, get transferred to enjoy a speedboat trip from Blue Bay to Ile aux Cerfs, discovering 5 islands on Mauritius' East Coast.
The trip includes snorkelling in the marine park, visiting the Dalbair shipwreck and seeing the lighthouse on Ile aux Phare.
You'll also view historic ruins on Ile de la Passe, visit the GRSE waterfall and enjoy a beach BBQ lunch on Ilot Margenie.
Finally, cruise to Ile aux Flammant for stunning views before transferring back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Casela World of Adventures | A Day Filled with Thrilling Experiences
activities: Start your day by boarding a transfer for the Casela World of Adventures Tour, a unique park in Mauritius that is a zoo, activity centre and eco-resort all in one.
Once you reach, enjoy optional adventures like Safari Quad, where you ride a buggy through the terrain, or Mountain Ziplining for an adrenaline rush.
Try the thrilling "Walking with the Lion" activity and walk side by side with these majestic creatures.
After an exciting day, get transferred to your resort for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Day at Leisure
activities: Today get ready to discover Mauritius at your own pace.
You can explore bustling restaurants and city hubs, or delve into cultural gems like the Mauritius Postal Museum.
Also, you can take a serene walk through dense forests and tranquil lakes at Bel Ombre Nature Reserve or encounter wildlife at Bras D'Eau National Park.
After sightseeing, treat yourself to a delicious Mauritian dinner before returning to your resort for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 7 Departure Day
activities: Today marks the end of your trip to paradise!
Post check-out, get transferred to the airport to board your flight back home with a bag of memories and souvenirs that you have gathered throughout the journey.

destinations.title: SriLanka Tour Packages
destinations.highlight: We’ve proudly served over 1 lakh happy customers with our Srilanka tour packages – and their satisfaction speaks for itself.
destinations.about: At Tripdekhoo, we prioritize exceptional customer service and seamless experiences. From hotels, visas, and flights to sightseeing and end-to-end transfers, we take care of everything so you can travel stress-free.

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Colombo | En route visit to Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage | Transfer to Dambulla
activities: Welcome to Sri Lanka! Upon your arrival at the airport, board your transfer and enjoy a scenic drive to Dambulla, a cultural gem in the heart of the island.
En route, make a stop and visit the Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage, a sanctuary dedicated to the care of orphaned and injured elephants.
Also, get a rare glimpse into their daily lives of being fed and bathed.
After an amazing visit, continue your journey to Dambulla.
Upon reaching your hotel, check in and enjoy your overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Excursion to Sigiriya
activities: In the morning, board your transfer to the iconic Sigiriya Rock Fortress, a UNESCO World Heritage Site and one of Sri Lanka's iconic landmarks.
Once there, climb the stone-carved staircase, passing the intricately painted frescoes and the impressive Lion’s Gate, a testament to the site’s regal past.
From the top, marvel at the panoramic views of lush forests and villages.
Also, explore the royal gardens and marvel at the intricate stone carvings.
Later, get driven back to your hotel in Dambulla.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Transfer to Nuwara Eliya | En Route Kandy Sightseeing Tour
activities: Post check-out, get driven to Nuwara Eliya.
En route, explore Kandy on a sightseeing tour and visit the towering Bahirawakanda Vihara Buddha Statue, offering panoramic views of Kandy.
Next, visit the Peradeniya Botanical Gardens & witness its stunning collection of over 4,000 plant species.
Also, wander through the iconic Royal Palm Avenue & visit the Temple of the Sacred Tooth Relic, one of Buddhism’s most significant sites.
Then, continue your journey, & upon arrival, check-in to your hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Nuwara Eliya Sightseeing Tour
activities: Today, explore Nuwara Eliya on a sightseeing tour.
Begin with a visit to the Hanuman Temple, a sanctuary steeped in Ramayana mythology, & soak in its calming atmosphere.
Next, marvel at the breathtaking Ramboda Falls and admire the intricate architecture of Seetha Amman Kovil, a sacred temple associated with the epic tale of Ramayana.
Also, stroll through the Hakgala Botanical Gardens & Victoria Park, home to diverse flora.
Conclude your day at the Gregory Lake, where you can opt for boating.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Transfer to Colombo | Colombo Sightseeing Tour
activities: After check-out, get driven to Colombo, Sri Lanka’s bustling capital.
Upon arrival, check-in to your hotel and realx.
Later, explore the city on a sightseeing tour & visit the iconic Lotus Tower, a striking landmark that offers panoramic views of Colombo’s skyline.
Next, marvel at the traditional and contemporary architecture of the Gangaramaya Buddhist Temple.
Continue to the Pettah Floating Market to witness its stunning floating stalls and explore more of Colombo’s attractions.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Departure Day
activities: In the morning, get ready and check-out from your hotel.
Then, board your transfer to Colombo Airport.
Once there, board your flight back home, this marks the end of your amazing Sri Lanka trip!

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Colombo | En route visit to Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage | Transfer to Kandy | Lake Drive with Kandyan Dance Show
activities: Welcome to Sri Lanka! Upon your arrival at the airport, board the transfer to Kandy.
En route, visit the Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage.
Upon reaching Kandy, check in to your hotel and later, embark on a scenic drive around Upper Lake, offering picturesque views of the city from Kandy View Point.
Admire the picturesque beauty of Kandy Lake before witnessing the vibrant Kandyan Dance performance, which includes a mesmerizing fire-walking ritual.
Afterward, get driven back to the hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Day Trip to Sigiriya
activities: In the morning, you'll be driven to the Sigiriya Rock Fortress, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, renowned for its unique Lion's Rock Fortress perched atop a massive rock column.
Explore the intricate frescoes and the ancient engineering of the water gardens that surround the base.
Optionally, climb the 1,200 steps to the summit for panoramic views of lush forests and distant mountains.
Afterward, you'll be driven back to your hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Half-Day Kandy Sightseeing Tour | Transfer to Nuwara Eliya
activities: Today, check out from the hotel and get transferred for a Kandy sightseeing tour.
Visit the Bahirawakanda Vihara Buddha Statue atop Bahirawakanda Hill and enjoy panoramic views of Kandy.
Stroll through the stunning Peradeniya Royal Botanical Gardens, home to exotic orchids.
Visit the Temple of the Sacred Tooth Relic, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
Afterwards, get driven to your hotel in Nuwara Eliya and check-in.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Nuwara Eliya Sightseeing Tour | Transfer to Bentota
activities: Check out and board the transfer for a Nuwara Eliya sightseeing tour.
Visit the Seetha Amman Temple, believed to be the place where Seetha was held captive by Ravana.
Explore Hakgala Botanical Garden, Victoria Park, and enjoy a stroll around Gregory Lake.
Afterwards, continue to Bentota and, upon arrival, check in to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Day Trip to Galle and Mirissa
activities: In the morning, check out from your hotel and get driven to Galle.
Visit the Dutch Reformed Church and the Galle Dutch Fort, a UNESCO World Heritage site.
Explore the Galle Fort Lighthouse and capture panoramic views of the coastline.
Continue to Mirissa, relax at Mirissa Beach and enjoy a walk to Coconut Tree Hill.
Later, get driven back to the hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Transfer to Colombo | Colombo Sightseeing Tour
activities: Check out and board the transfer to Colombo.
Upon arrival, check in at your hotel and begin a Colombo sightseeing tour.
Visit the Gangaramaya Temple, one of the oldest Buddhist temples in the city.
Explore the Colombo Lotus Tower, the tallest structure in South Asia.
Browse the Pettah Floating Market and stroll through Galle Face Green Beach.
Later, get driven back to the hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 7 Departure Day
activities: After breakfast, pack your bags and check-out from the hotel.
Get transferred to the airport for your flight.
This is where your trip comes to an end.

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Colombo | Transfer to Bentota
activities: Upon arrival, get transferred from the airport to the hotel in Bentota for check-in.
Board the transfer for the Bentota sightseeing tour.
Visit Kosgoda Turtle Hatchery and explore the Madu River.
Enjoy water sports like jet skiing at Bentota Beach.
Later, return to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Excursion to Mirissa
activities: Get assisted for an excursion to Mirissa.
Visit the Galle Fort and see attractions like the Galle Lighthouse and Meera Mosque.
Continue to Mirissa Beach, admire the views from Coconut Tree Hill and Parrot Rock.
Optional: Go whale watching (early morning).
Get transferred back to the hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Arrival in Colombo | Colombo Sightseeing Tour
activities: Check out and get transferred to the hotel in Colombo for check-in.
Embark on a city sightseeing tour.
Explore iconic attractions like the Lotus Tower, Gangaramaya Buddhist Temple, Pettah Floating Market, and more.
Later, return to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Departure Day
activities: After breakfast, get transferred to the airport to board your flight back home.
This is where your trip ends.

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Colombo | Transfer to Kandy | Enroute Visit to Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage | Kandyan Dance Show
activities: Arrive in Colombo and get transferred to Kandy.
Enroute visit Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage to see injured and abandoned elephants.
Check in at the hotel in Kandy.
Drive around Kandy Lake and attend a traditional Kandyan Dance Show.
Return to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Kandy Sightseeing Tour
activities: Visit Market Crafts Centre for handmade items and souvenirs.
Explore the Gem Museum with semi-precious stones.
Walk through Royal Botanical Gardens and the Spice Garden.
Visit Orchid House and the Temple of the Tooth Relic (Kandy Temple).

itinerary.day: Day 3 Transfer to Nuwara Eliya | Nuwara Eliya Sightseeing Tour
activities: Check out and transfer to Nuwara Eliya.
Check in at the hotel and begin the city tour.
Visit Seetha Eliya Temple and Hakgala Botanical Gardens.
Explore Victoria Park and Gregory Lake (optional boating).
See Ramboda Falls and Hanuman Temple.
Return to the hotel for overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Transfer to Bentota | Enroute Visit to Edinburgh Viewpoint & Kithulgala | Day at Leisure
activities: Check out and drive to Bentota.
Stop at Edinburgh Viewpoint and Kithulgala (optional rafting at Kelani River).
Check in at the hotel in Bentota.
Optional visits to Cinnamon Island or Brief Garden.
Return to hotel for overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Visit to Madu River & Kosgoda Turtle Hatchery
activities: Enjoy a boat safari at Madu River (optional, extra cost).
Spot mangroves and wildlife during the cruise.
Visit Kosgoda Turtle Hatchery and witness sea turtles and hatchlings.
Return to the hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Excursion to Mirissa & Galle
activities: Drive to Galle and visit Dutch Reformed Church.
Explore Dutch Fort and Fort Lighthouse.
Visit the Maritime Museum and Meera Mosque.
Travel to Mirissa Beach, walk along the coastline, and visit Coconut Tree Hill.
Return to hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 7 Transfer to Colombo | Colombo Sightseeing Tour
activities: Check out and drive to Colombo.
Check in at the hotel and start the city tour.
Visit Galle Face Green and Gangaramaya Temple.
Explore Colombo Fort and Lotus Tower.
Walk on the Suspension Bridge and visit the Floating Market.
Return to the hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 8 Departure Day
activities: Reflect on your Sri Lanka memories.
Check out from the hotel and transfer to the airport.
Board your flight back home.

destinations.title: Thailand Tour Packages
destinations.highlight: We’ve proudly served over 1 lakh happy customers with our Thailand tour packages – and their satisfaction speaks for itself.
destinations.about: At Tripdekhoo, we prioritize exceptional customer service and seamless experiences. From hotels, visas, and flights to sightseeing and end-to-end transfers, we take care of everything so you can travel stress-free.

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Bangkok I Day at Leisure
activities: Upon arrival in Bangkok, get transferred to your hotel. After check-in, spend the rest of the day at leisure.
You can visit Amphawa Floating Market and Chatuchak Weekend Market and can buy souvenirs.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Bangkok City Tour with Chao Phraya Princess Dinner Cruise
activities: In the morning get ready to go on a Bangkok city tour.
Visit famous attractions such as Gems Gallery, Golden Buddha Temple, and many more.
In the evening you will get transferred to the pier for Chao Phraya dinner cruise.
Later, return to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Arrival in Phuket
activities: Check-out and get transferred to Bangkok Airport for your flight to Phuket.
Upon arrival, check-in and spend the day at leisure.
Overnight stay at the hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Excursion to Phi Phi Island
activities: Get transferred to the Phuket pier in the morning for your excursion to Phi Phi Island.
Hop on a speedboat and begin your tour with the stunning Maya Bay & Loh Samah Bay.
Also, visit the mysterious Viking Caves, and Monkey Island .
Later, return to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Half Day City Tour of Phuket
activities: Get transferred for a half-day city tour of Phuket.
Enjoy shopping at the Souvenir Market.
Visit to the Karon View Point to enjoy the views of Kata Noi, Kata Yai, and Karon beaches, followed by a visit to Wat Chalong Temple.
Later, get transferred to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Transfer to Krabi
activities: Post-checkout from your hotel, get transferred to your pre-booked hotel in Krabi.
Check-in, and spend the rest of the day at leisure.
You can rent a boat from Krabi town or Ao Nang and explore the islands on your own.
Later, head back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 7 Krabi 4 Island Tour
activities: Get transferred to Railay Beach for your Krabi 4 Island tour.
Hop on a shared speedboat to Koh Poda Island.
Later, you will also visit Chicken Island and Phranang Cave Beach.
After the tour, get transferred from Krabi Pier to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 8 Departure Day
activities: After check- out from the hotel in Krabi, get transferred to Krabi International Airport for your flight back home.
This marks the end of your trip.

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Phuket | Transfer to Krabi | Leisure Day
activities: The city of Phuket welcomes you! Upon arrival at the airport, board your transfer to Krabi.
As you reach the hotel, check-in and take some rest.
You can spend the rest of the day exploring Krabi at your own pace.
You can visit the beautiful Wat Tham Sua Temple or the Krabi Elephant Sanctuary.
Later, return to the hotel on your own for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Leisure Day in Krabi
activities: Take this day to relax at your hotel or set out to explore Krabi on your own.
You can choose to take the Krabi 4-Island tour to explore some of its iconic islands like Tup Island, Poda Island, Phra Nang Beach, and Kai Island.
Later, return to the hotel by yourself for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Transfer to Phuket | Leisure Day
activities: On this day, after you check out, you will be transferred to Phuket.
Upon reaching the resort, check in and take some rest.
Enjoy the rest of the day at leisure.
You can explore the city of Phuket at your own pace.
Patong Beach and Bangla Road are two key attractions that you can visit.
Alternatively, you may also watch the vibrant Simon Cabaret show.
Later, return to the resort on your own for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Leisure Day in Phuket
activities: Enjoy this day exploring the beautiful island city of Phuket.
You can visit iconic attractions like Karon View Point for panoramic views of the sea front, and Wat Chalong temple, also called the Chaithararam Temple.
Also, marvel at the Big Buddha, a 45 metre marble-crafted statue.
Conclude your day with a visit to the Phuket Fanta Sea, a cultural theme park where you can watch theatrical performances.
Later, head back to the hotel by yourself for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Leisure Day in Phuket
activities: As you wake up to a beautiful morning, make the most of your day by exploring Phuket on your own.
You can plan a day trip to the famous Phi Phi Island where you can visit the Maya Bay, Loh Samah Bay, Viking Cave, and Monkey Beach.
Later, return to your hotel in Phuket for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Departure Day
activities: Enjoy your breakfast and check out from the hotel.
Then, get transferred to the Phuket International Airport for your departure.
This is where your trip ends.
Have a safe journey ahead.

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Phuket | Day at Leisure
activities: Welcome to Phuket! Upon arrival at Phuket Airport, you will be transferred to your hotel.
Check in and spend your day at leisure.
Today, you can explore the beauty of Phuket by strolling through Phuket's Old Town.
Next, you can visit Wat Chalong, the island’s largest and most revered Buddhist temple, and then you can head to Promthep Cape for stunning sunset views.
After a day of exploration, return to the hotel on your own for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Day Trip to Phi Phi Island
activities: In the morning, get transferred from the hotel to the Phuket Marina to board the speedboat for the Phi Phi Island Tour.
Spend an adventurous time journeying through Koh Poda Island, to admire its turquoise waters and white sandy beaches.
Also, explore the Ko Kai, or Chicken Island, known for its unique rock formations and Tup Island, famous for offering various water sports options and scenic views, among other famous spots.
Later, you'll be transferred back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Visit to Tiger Kingdom | Day at Leisure
activities: In the morning, board your transfer to Tiger Kingdom.
Experience the thrill of interacting closely with tigers and learning about their conservation.
Later, get driven back to your hotel.

You can even spend the rest of the day exploring Phuket's attractions like Tha Rua Shrine and Phuket Aquarium, where you can see sharks, stingrays, vibrant coral reefs, and colorful fish as you walk through transparent tunnels.
Later, return to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Transfer to Krabi | Day at Leisure
activities: In the morning, check out from the hotel and get transferred to your hotel in Krabi.
Upon arrival, check in and spend the day at your leisure.
You can visit Wat Kaew Korawaram Temple, a wonderful Buddhist temple with an impressive entrance and Thai-style architecture.
Additionally, you can take a boat ride to explore Khao Khanap Nam or enjoy a elephant ride at Krabi Elephant Sanctuary.
Later, return to the hotel on your own for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Krabi 4 Islands Tour
activities: Today, you will be transferred to Krabi Pier to board a speedboat for the Krabi Four Islands Tour.
During this visit, explore Phranang Cave, known for its scenic caves and beaches.
Also visit Chicken Island, named after a stone formation resembling a chicken's head.
Marvel at the sandbar that links Tup Island and Poda Island during low tide, ideal for sunbathing and snorkelling.
Afterwards, get transferred back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Krabi Rainforest Discovery Tour
activities: In the morning, board your transfer to the Krabi rainforest.
En route, soak in the scenic landscape of the Rainforest, which houses a variety of flora, fauna and waterbodies.
Explore the beautiful Tiger Cave Temple to see the tiger paw prints and towering Buddha statues.
You can also climb the 1,260 steps to the hilltop shrine and admire the panoramic views of the Andaman Sea.
Then, take a refreshing dip in the crystal-clear waters of the Emerald Pool.
Later, get driven back to the hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 7 Departure Day
activities: In the morning, check out of the hotel and get transferred to the Phuket airport for your flight back home.

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Bangkok
activities: Welcome to the City of Angels, Bangkok! Upon your arrival at the airport, you will be transferred to your pre-booked hotel.
After reaching the hotel, you can relax for the day or spend the day exploring some of the famous places in the city like the Floating Market Bangkok, ﻿Siam Park City, among others.
Afterwards, head back to the hotel on your own for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Visit to Safari World | Chao Phraya Dinner Cruise Experience
activities: Begin your day with an exciting adventure at Safari World, Bangkok's premier animal park.
Get transferred from the hotel to the Safari World and enjoy close-up encounters with exotic animals during the safari drive and captivating marine life shows.
After that, get transferred to Asiatique The Riverfront, to board your Chao Phraya Cruise and admire the beauty of Bangkok's skyline as you sail along the shores.
Later, get transferred back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Transfer to Pattaya | Alcazar Cabaret Show
activities: Check out from your Bangkok hotel and enjoy a scenic drive to Pattaya.
Upon arrival, check in to your Pattaya hotel and spend some time at leisure, exploring nearby attractions or relaxing by the beach.
In the evening, prepare for an unforgettable experience at the Alcazar Show.
Known for its dazzling performances, the Alcazar Show features elaborate costumes, impressive stage designs, and talented performers.
Later, get transferred back to your hotel for an overnight stay in Pattaya.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Day Trip to Coral Island
activities: Start your day with a thrilling adventure to Coral Island (Koh Larn).
Depart from Pattaya by speedboat and arrive at this tropical paradise known for its clear turquoise waters and sandy beaches.
Spend the day engaging in various water activities such as snorkeling, parasailing, and jet-skiing, or simply relax and soak up the sun.
After a day of fun and relaxation, return to Pattaya by speedboat.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Departure Day
activities: Check out from your Pattaya hotel, and get transferred to the airport for your departure flight.
Reflect on the memorable experiences and adventures you've had during your Bangkok and Pattaya tour.

destinations.title: Europe Tour Packages
destinations.highlight: We’ve proudly served over 1 lakh happy customers with our Europe tour packages – and their satisfaction speaks for itself.
destinations.about: At Tripdekhoo, we prioritize exceptional customer service and seamless experiences. From hotels, visas, and flights to sightseeing and end-to-end transfers, we take care of everything so you can travel stress-free.

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Paris | Day at leisure
activities: Welcome to the City of Light, Paris! Upon arrival at the Paris International Airport, get driven to your hotel.
Check-in and spend your time at leisure.
You can explore Montmartre, a hilltop neighborhood known for its bohemian history, art scene, and the stunning Sacré-Cœur Basilica with panoramic city views.
You can also discover Rue Montorgueil, a lively street famous for its Parisian cafés, fresh markets, bakeries, and authentic local vibe—perfect for a true taste of Parisian daily life.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Paris Hop on Hop off Tour | Eiffel Tower 2nd level tickets
activities: Kickstart your Paris journey with a scenic hop-on, hop-off bus tour.
Cruise past iconic landmarks like the Louvre, Moulin Rouge, Champs-Élysées, and Notre-Dame, while enjoying panoramic city views and informative audio commentary.
Hop off and head to the Eiffel Tower.
Once there, ascend to the second level for breathtaking views over Paris.
Explore the city’s rich history, grand architecture, and artistic culture all in one unforgettable ride.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Disneyland Paris Tour (Optional Tour)
activities: In the morning, you can opt for an escape to Walt Disney World with an optional tour of Disneyland Paris.
You can take local transport and reach Disneyland to soak-in the magical atmosphere.
Meet your favorite Disney characters, watch the Stars fireworks show, and enjoy thrilling rides.
You can explore the Disney Park or the immersive Walt Disney Studios Park, for a unique and unforgettable experience.
After a fun-filled day, return to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Transfer to Zurich
activities: In the morning, check-out from your hotel and head to the Paris Gare De Lyon Station to board your train for Zurich, one of the most beautiful cities in Switzerland.
Upon arrival at Zürich Hbf Station, use your Swiss pass to take local transport to your hotel & check-in.
Then, spend the rest of the day at leisure, where you can explore a huge collection of artworks in the Kunsthaus and visit the famous Bahnhofstrasse, a vibrant street in Zurich.
Later, return to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Mt Rigi and Lucerne Day Trip with Boat Ride
activities: Today, use your Swiss pass and reach Zurich Central bus Station to board the coach for Mt. Rigi.
Upon reaching, enjoy a cable car ride followed by a cogwheel train to the top of Mt. Rigi.
Take-in the stunning views before descending to Vitznau.
Next, enjoy a scenic boat ride on the calming Lake Lucerne surrounded with mountains.
Also, you can explore Lucerne on your own before transferring back to Zurich Central Bus Station.
From there, return to your hotel on your own for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Rhine Falls Boat Trip
activities: Today, board a train from Zurich using your Swiss pass to reach Schaffhausenuse and witness Europe’s biggest waterfall, the Rhine Falls.
Enjoy a boat ride to get close to the waterfall and feel the mist, while enjoying stunning views of the cascading water.
Post-tour, you can explore Zurich and visit the Swiss National Museum, the famous FIFA Museum, and many more attractions with your Swiss pass for discounts.
Later, return to your hotel on your own for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 7 Farewell Switzerland – Departure from Zurich
activities: It’s time to say goodbye to the land of mountains, chocolate, and unforgettable memories.
Check out and transfer to Zurich Airport for your onward journey, carrying with you the timeless beauty and tranquility of Switzerland in your heart.

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Paris | Day at Leisure
activities: Welcome to "The City of Light," Paris! Upon landing at the Airport, meet your driver and get driven to your hotel.
Post check-in, spend the rest of your day at leisure, where you relax or explore the city on your own.
You can visit iconic spots like the Latin Quarter, a historic hub of cafés.
Also, you can visit the Centre Pompidou, a modern art haven with its unique architectural design, or visit Parc Astérix, where thrilling rides and shows bring the world of the famous comic to life.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Paris Sightseeing | Funicular Ride to Montmartre | Seine River Cruise
activities: Today, explore Paris on a sightseeing tour.
Start with a visit to Place Vendôme, known for its luxury boutiques, & the grand Place de l’Opéra Garnier, an architectural masterpiece.
Then, marvel at a symbol of French history, the Arc de Triomphe, & ascend to the 3rd floor of the iconic Eiffel Tower for amazing city views.
Afterward, take a funicular up to Montmartre and see the Basilica of Sacré-Cœur.
Later, enjoy a relaxing Seine River cruise, offering a unique perspective of stunning landmarks.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Day Trip to Disneyland
activities: In the morning, get driven to the Disneyland park, where a world of magic and adventure awaits.
Once there, dive into the thrilling rides and studio movie experiences.

Choose between the classic Disneyland Park, filled with beloved attractions, live shows, and vibrant parades featuring Disney characters, or the Walt Disney Studios Park, where you’ll witness stunt shows, film sets, and be immersed in movie magic.
Also, savor meals at the themed restaurants before getting driven back to your hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Transfer to Lausanne via Geneva | Orientation Tour of Geneva
activities: After check-out, enjoy a scenic drive to Lausanne, nestled in Switzerland’s French-speaking region.
En route, make a stop at Geneva for an orientation tour.
During the tour, witness the stunning Jet d’Eau, one of the tallest fountains in the world, and pass by the United Nations buildings, a global symbol of diplomacy.
Also, stroll past the charming Flower Clock and take in the beauty of Lake Geneva’s sparkling waters.
Later, continue to Lausanne and upon arrival, check into your hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Transfer to Zurich | Visit to Olympic Museum | Day Trip to Mount Titlis
activities: Post check-out, get driven to Zurich.
En route, make a stop at the Olympic Museum in Lausanne, the world's largest archive of Olympic Games memorabilia.
Then, get driven to Titlisbahn Cable Car Station and from there, ascend Mount Titlis aboard the Rotair, the world’s first revolving cable car.
At the summit, walk across the exhilarating Cliff Walk, Europe’s highest suspension bridge, & enjoy amazing views of the Alps.
Later, continue to Zürich & upon arrival, check into your hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Excursion to Jungfraujoch
activities: Get ready for an excursion to Jungfraujoch, the top of Europe.
You'll be driven to Grindelwald Terminal to board the Eiger Express to Eigergletscher.
From here, enjoy a cogwheel train from Eigergletscher to Jungfraujoch, the highest-altitude railway station in Europe!
Upon reaching the top, explore the Ice Palace to see the ice sculptures and visit the Sphinx observatory for panoramic views of the Aletsch Glacier.
Later, you'll be driven to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 7 Transfer to Lugano via Lucerne | Lucerne Sightseeing & Cruise on Lake Lucerne
activities: After check-out, get driven to Lugano, nestled in Switzerland’s charming Italian-speaking region.
On the way, make a stop in Lucerne and explore landmarks like the Kapellbrücke, Europe’s oldest covered wooden bridge, and the poignant Lion Monument.
Also, stroll through cobbled lanes and shop for exquisite Swiss watches and chocolates.
Later, enjoy a relaxing Lake Lucerne cruise, offering panoramic views of alpine peaks.
Later, continue to Lugano and check into your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 8 Transfer to Padova via Venice | Venice Sightseeing Tour | Gondola Ride in Venice
activities: Check out and enjoy a scenic journey to the "Floating City of Italy," Venice.
Once there, embark on a private boat ride from the Venice Pier and sail through the Giudecca Canal to reach St. Mark’s Square.
Here, admire the iconic St. Mark's Basilica, the Bell Tower, the Clock Tower with astrological symbols, and cross the Bridge of Sighs.
Next, experience a Murano Glass demonstration before enjoying a gondola ride in a Venetian rowing boat.
Post-tour, get driven to Padova & check into your hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 9 Transfer to Tuscany via Florence | Florence Guided Walking Tour
activities: Today, after check-out, get driven to Tuscany via Florence, the "Cradle of the Renaissance."
Upon reaching Florence, explore the city on a guided walking tour, visiting the Duomo, Gates to Paradise, Piazza del Duomo, and Ponte Vecchio.
Next, you'll be driven to Piazzale Michelangelo, and admire the panoramic views of Florence from the top.
Then, visit the Square of Miracles in Pisa, home to the Leaning Tower and soak in the vibrant atmosphere.
Later, as you reach Tuscany, check into your hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 10 Transfer to Rome | Vatican City Tour
activities: In the morning, get ready to check out from your hotel and get driven to the eternal city, Rome.
Upon your arrival, discover the heart of Rome, the Vatican City! and visit the Vatican Museum to see various classical sculptures.
Next, explore the famous Sistine Chapel, which is the pope's official residence, and admire the beauty of St. Peter's Basilica.
End your city tour by visiting the Colosseum, and later, get dropped off at your hotel for check-in, followed by an overnight stay in Rome.

itinerary.day: Day 11 Departure Day
activities: Pack your bag full of memories and check out of your hotel.
Then, get transferred to Rome Airport for your flight back home, marking the end of this amazing Europe trip!

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Milan | Day at Leisure
activities: Welcome to Italy! Upon your arrival at Milan Airport, get transferred to your hotel.
Check in and spend the rest of your day at leisure. You can visit the Milan Cathedral, a masterpiece of Gothic architecture.
You can also step into the Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II, one of the world’s oldest shopping arcades.
Later, return to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Transfer to Verona | Day Trip to Italy's Lake Region
activities: Check out from the hotel and get transferred to Verona.
En route, make a stop at Italy’s Lake Region. Visit Orta de San Giulio and board the tourist train to Orta Piazza.
Take the ferry to San Giulio Island and its monastery.
Continue your journey to Verona, with a stop at Stresa before checking in at your hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Transfer to Venice | St. Marks Square Boat Tour | Visit to Murano Glass Factory
activities: Check out from the hotel and head to Venice.
Upon arrival, take a scenic boat tour of St. Mark’s Square, admire the Basilica and Campanile.
Visit the Murano Glass Factory and witness the famous glassmaking technique.
Check in at your hotel in Venice for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Transfer to Perugia via Padua, San Marino and Gubbio
activities: Check out from the hotel and get transferred to Perugia.
En route, visit the Basilica of St. Anthony in Padua and admire its Byzantine architecture.
Explore San Marino’s Guaita Tower and Falesia Second Tower.
Stop at Gubbio to see the Basilica of Sant'Ubaldo and Palace of Consoli.
Arrive in Perugia, check in at your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Perugia Sightseeing Tour | Transfer to Naples via Assisi
activities: In the morning, embark on a Perugia sightseeing tour, visiting Rocca Paolina and the Etruscan Arch.
Stop by a local chocolate shop to try Perugia's famous chocolates.
Later, head to Naples, with a lunch stop in Assisi to visit Rocca Maggiore and the Franciscan Monastery.
Arrive in Naples, check in at your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Transfer to Salerno via Capri & Sorrento
activities: Check out from your hotel and get transferred to Naples port.
Hop on a ferry to Capri and explore the island, including the Grotta Bianca and Faraglioni rocks.
Afterward, stop at Sorrento and visit the Fiordo Di Furore and Li Galli Island.
Continue your journey to Salerno Port and check in at your hotel for the night.

itinerary.day: Day 7 Transfer to Rome via Pompeii, Naples & Cassino
activities: Check out from your hotel and head towards Rome.
Visit Pompeii on a guided tour, including the House of the Faun and Lupanare.
Make a stop in Naples to visit Chiesa del Gesu Nuovo.
Continue to Cassino to explore the Cassino Memorial and the Historiale di Cassino.
Arrive in Rome, check in at your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 8 Departure Day
activities: In the morning, check out from your hotel and get transferred to Rome Airport.
Board your flight back home, marking the end of your Italy trip!

destinations.title: Kenya Tour Packages
destinations.highlight: We’ve proudly served over 1 lakh happy customers with our Kenya tour packages – and their satisfaction speaks for itself.
destinations.about: At Tripdekhoo, we prioritize exceptional customer service and seamless experiences. From hotels, visas, and flights to sightseeing and end-to-end transfers, we take care of everything so you can travel stress-free.

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Nairobi
activities: Arrive at Jomo Kenyatta International Airport in Nairobi.
Meet your local representative and transfer to your pre-booked hotel.
Check-in and freshen up.
Spend the rest of the day at leisure, exploring top attractions like David Shedrick Wildlife Trust, Giraffe Centre, and Karen Blixen Museum.
Overnight stay at the hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Transfer to Masai Mara / Sightseeing
activities: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel and head to Nairobi Wilson Airport by road.
Board your flight to Kitchwa Tembo's private airstrip in Masai Mara.
Meet your local representative upon arrival and transfer to your camp.
In the afternoon, enjoy a thrilling safari.
Return to your camp for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Exploration Tour of Masai Mara
activities: Breakfast at your camp, followed by a full-day exploration of Masai Mara.
Enjoy thrilling game drives, bush walks, hot air balloon safaris, and night drives.
Return to your camp for a peaceful overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Transfer to Serengeti
activities: Enjoy breakfast at your camp and go on one last safari in Masai Mara.
Fly to Serengeti's nearest airstrip from Kitchwa Tembo's private airstrip.
Meet your local representative upon arrival and transfer to your camp.
Check-in and spend the rest of the day at leisure.
Overnight stay at your camp.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Exploration Tour of Serengeti
activities: Satisfying breakfast at your camp followed by a full-day exploration tour of Serengeti.
Experience the Great Migration and enjoy a thrilling privately guided safari.
Participate in exciting activities like hot air balloon rides, stargazing, and day trips to Shifting Sands and Olduvai Gorge.
Return to your camp for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Transfer to Lake Manyara
activities: Enjoy breakfast at your camp and proceed for one last game drive in Serengeti.
Fly to Lake Manyara airstrip.
Upon arrival, enjoy a thrilling game drive en route to your lodge.
Check-in and freshen up at your lodge.
Spend the rest of the day relaxing.

itinerary.day: Day 7 Exploration Tour Around Lake Manyara
activities: Enjoy a wholesome breakfast and spend the day on game drives and bicycling around Lake Manyara.
Explore the Masai culture and enjoy night drives.
Return to your lodge for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 8 Transfer to Ngorongoro Crater
activities: Breakfast at your lodge and enjoy one last game drive around Lake Manyara.
Travel to Ngorongoro Crater Lodge by road.
Check-in and freshen up at your lodge.
Optional activities: Invigorating massage or shopping.
Afternoon game drive at Ngorongoro Crater.
Return to your lodge for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 9 Exploration Tour of Ngorongoro
activities: Breakfast at your lodge followed by a day of exciting activities at Ngorongoro.
Enjoy game drives, walking safaris, day trips to Shifting Sands and Olduvai Gorge, and crater floor banquets.
Return to your lodge in the evening for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 10 Departure to India
activities: Breakfast at your lodge and explore the African bush for the last time.
Fly to Kilimanjaro International Airport via Lake Manyara Airstrip.
Board your flight back to India, marking the end of your Kenya Tanzania tour.

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Nairobi | Day at Leisure
activities: Arrive at Nairobi airport and meet your local representative.
Transfer to your hotel for check-in and relaxation.
Spend the rest of the day at leisure, exploring attractions like Bomas of Kenya, Nairobi National Museum, and Ngong Hills.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Transfer to Maasai Mara | Half-Day Maasai Mara Game Drive
activities: Check-out and embark on a scenic drive to Maasai Mara.
Check-in to your lodge and relax.
Enjoy a thrilling half-day game drive in the Maasai Mara National Reserve.
Return to the lodge for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Full-Day Game Drive at Maasai Mara National Reserve
activities: Full-day game drive in Maasai Mara to spot the Big Five and other wildlife.
Enjoy the beauty of the savannahs and diverse animal interactions.
Return to your lodge for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Transfer to Lake Naivasha | Boat Ride on Lake Naivasha
activities: Check-out and transfer to Lake Naivasha National Park.
Check-in to your lodge and relax.
Enjoy a boat ride on Lake Naivasha, spotting wildlife like hippos, giraffes, and a variety of birds.
Return to your lodge for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Transfer to Nairobi | Fly to Johannesburg | Day at Leisure
activities: Check-out and transfer to Nairobi airport for your flight to Johannesburg.
Arrive in Johannesburg and transfer to your hotel.
Spend the rest of the day at leisure, exploring the Apartheid Museum, Johannesburg Zoo, or Sandton City for shopping.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Transfer to Sun City | Day at Leisure
activities: Check-out and transfer to Sun City, the ultimate entertainment and resort destination.
Check-in and spend the day at leisure, exploring the Sun City Casino, Maze of the Lost City, or the golf courses.
Overnight stay at Sun City.

itinerary.day: Day 7 Morning Game Drive at Pilanesberg National Park | Day Trip to Valley of Waves
activities: Embark on a morning game drive at Pilanesberg National Park, spotting the Big Five and other wildlife.
After the drive, return to your hotel to relax.
Spend the afternoon at the Valley of Waves, enjoying water rides and wave pools.
Overnight stay at your hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 8 Transfer to Cape Town | Day at Leisure
activities: Check-out and transfer to OR Tambo International Airport for your flight to Cape Town.
Arrive at Cape Town and transfer to your hotel.
Spend the day at leisure, visiting attractions like Cape Town City Hall, District Six Museum, and V&A Waterfront.

itinerary.day: Day 9 Full Day Cape Peninsula Tour
activities: Take a scenic day trip to the Cape Peninsula.
Visit Hout Bay, take a boat ride to Seal Island, and explore the Cape Point & Good Hope Nature Reserve.
Visit Boulders Beach to see the African penguins.
Optional ride on the Flying Dutchman Funicular (extra cost).
Return to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 10 Departure Day
activities: Check-out from your hotel and transfer to the airport.
Board your flight back home, marking the end of your South Africa & Kenya Tour Package.

destinations.title: Egypt Tour Packages
destinations.highlight: We’ve proudly served over 1 lakh happy customers with our Egypt tour packages – and their satisfaction speaks for itself.
destinations.about: At Tripdekhoo, we prioritize exceptional customer service and seamless experiences. From hotels, visas, and flights to sightseeing and end-to-end transfers, we take care of everything so you can travel stress-free.

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Cairo | Day at Leisure
activities: Arrive at Cairo Airport and transfer to your hotel for check-in.
Relax and explore Cairo at your own pace.
Visit Al Azhar Park for serene landscapes and city views.
Explore the Ibn Tulun Mosque known for its unique architecture.
Return to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Great Pyramid Tour | Visit to Sakkara & Memphis
activities: Visit the Giza Pyramids including the Great Pyramid and the Sphinx.
Explore the Step Pyramid of Djoser in Sakkara.
Discover Memphis, the ancient capital of Egypt with grand statues.
Transfer back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Cairo to Luxor Via Train | Sightseeing Tour to Luxor East Bank
activities: Take a scenic train journey from Cairo to Luxor.
Check into your hotel and relax.
Visit Karnak Temple and its sacred lake.
Explore the Luxor Temple with its magnificent carvings.
Return to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Luxor West Bank Sightseeing | Transfer to Hurghada
activities: Check-out and begin transfer to Hurghada.
Visit Queen Hatshepsut Temple and Colossi of Memnon on the way.
Arrive in Hurghada, check-in to your hotel and relax.
Optionally visit the Monastery of St. Paul or Hurghada Museum.
Overnight stay at the hotel in Hurghada.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Day at Leisure in Hurghada
activities: Day at leisure to explore Hurghada.
Visit the Hurghada Museum and Grand Aquarium.
Enjoy the Marina’s restaurants and shops.
Return to your hotel on your own for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Transfer to Cairo | Day at Leisure
activities: Check out from your hotel and transfer back to Cairo.
Check-in at your hotel in Cairo and relax.
Visit Al Manial Palace Museum and the Nilometer.
Stroll through Cairo’s vibrant streets and try local delicacies.
Overnight stay at your hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 7 Departure Day
activities: Check out from your hotel.
Transfer to Cairo Airport for your departure.
End of your Egypt tour.

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Cairo | Day at Leisure
activities: Welcome to Cairo! Upon arrival in Cairo, you’ll be transferred to your hotel.
Check in and spend the day at your leisure.
You can then explore the vibrant city at your own pace.
Stroll through Al Azhar Park, known for its lush gardens and panoramic views of Cairo’s skyline.
Wander through Kahn El Khalili, a bustling bazaar famous for its rich history and diverse shops, soaking in the local charm and history.
Later, return to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Tour to The Great Pyramids of Giza
activities: In the morning, get ready to explore Giza.
Start your day with a tour of the magnificent Giza Pyramids, including Cheops, Chephren, and Mykerinos.
Visit the Valley Temple, known for its role in the mummification process of King Chephren.
You can then view the Sphinx, a mythical creature with a lion's body and the head of King Chephren.
Experience the grandeur and mystery of these ancient structures.
Later, you'll be transferred to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Cairo Old City Tour
activities: Today, explore Cairo’s rich history with an Old City Tour.
Start at the Egyptian Museum and explore the treasures of Tutankhamun.
Next, visit the Citadel of Cairo, offering panoramic views of the city.
You can marvel at the Alabaster Mosque, celebrated for its beautiful white marble.
Explore Cairo’s Christian heritage by visiting the Coptic sites, including Abu Serga Church, the Hanging Church, and the Ben Ezra Synagogue.
Later, you'll get driven to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Arrival in Aswan | Nile River Cruise | Aswan Sightseeing Tour & Felucca Boat Ride
activities: After checking out, fly to Aswan and transfer to Aswan Port for your Nile River cruise.
Begin with a tour of Aswan, starting at the High Dam, a crucial structure that regulates the Nile's water flow.
Visit the Unfinished Obelisk, revealing the intricacies of ancient Egyptian stonework.
Discover the Philae Temple, known for its dedication to the goddess Isis.
You can then unwind with a felucca ride on the Nile's calm waters.
Later, you'll be transferred to your cruise for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Cruise to Luxor | Abu Simbel, Kom Ombu and Edfu Sightseeing
activities: Start your day with a visit to the majestic Abu Simbel, known for its colossal rock-cut temples dedicated to Ramses II.
Afterward, you can sail to Kom Ombo, where you can explore the unique double temple dedicated to the crocodile god Sobek and the falcon god Horus.
Next, sail to Edfu and visit the Temple of Horus, the best-preserved temple in Egypt.
Finally, you can continue sailing to Luxor through Esna.
Spend the night on the cruise and experience the vibrant Galabiya party with dinner.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Luxor East Bank Tour
activities: In the morning, relax on the cruise, basking in the warm sunlight and serene waters.
Later, set out to explore the grandeur of Karnak Temple, renowned for its colossal columns and majestic statues, and Luxor Temple, famous for its stunning obelisks and ancient inscriptions.
After exploring Egypt’s rich history, return to the cruise.
Enjoy an exciting disco and music party as you relax and soak in the evening’s entertainment before getting transferred for an overnight stay on the cruise.

itinerary.day: Day 7 Luxor West Bank Tour | Transfer to Hurghada
activities: After checking out from the cruise, journey to the West Bank of Luxor.
Visit the Valley of the Kings & explore the tombs of pharaohs, each adorned with vivid murals and hieroglyphs.
Admire the Queen Hatshepsut Temple.
Next, see the Colossi of Memnon, towering statues of Amenhotep III, Ramses III's mortuary temple, and marvel at Ramses II's temple with its imposing pillars.
Later, get transferred to Hurghada.
Check in for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 8 Leisure Day at Hurghada
activities: In the morning, get ready and spend your day at leisure.
You can explore Hurghada at your own pace.
You can enjoy the thrilling adventure of water sports at the beautiful Red Sea beaches or visit Al-Mina Mosque, renowned for its stunning architecture and tranquil ambiance.
Explore the Hurghada Grand Aquarium to marvel at marine life or discover the rich history at the Hurghada Museum.
Later, return to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 9 Transfer from Hurghada to Cairo | Day at Leisure
activities: After checking out, head to the airport for your flight back to Cairo.
Upon arrival, you'll be transferred to your hotel in Cairo.
Check in to your hotel and relax for a while.
You can explore the Coptic Church, which boasts historical significance and stunning ancient design.
Alternatively, visit Khan El Khalil, a vibrant market offering unique souvenirs and a taste of local delicacies.
Spend your day enjoying these experiences before returning to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 10 Departure Day
activities: After checking out of your hotel in Cairo, you'll be transferred to the airport for your flight back home.
This marks the end of your trip

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Cairo | Day at Leisure
activities: Welcome to Egypt! Upon arrival at Cairo Airport, get driven to your hotel.
Post check-in, spend the rest of your day at leisure, where you can relax or explore the city on your own.
You can enjoy a leisurely stroll at the Al Azhar Park, a lush garden with breathtaking views of Cairo.
Also, you can visit one of Cairo's oldest mosques, the Ibn Tulun Mosque, & admire its ancient minaret, offering a glimpse into Cairo’s medieval Islamic past.
Afterwards, return to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Visit to Pyramids of Giza | Sakkara & Memphis Tour | Fly to Luxor
activities: Post check-out, board your transfer to the iconic Pyramids of Giza, where the towering Great Pyramid, Pyramid of Khafre, & Pyramid of Menkaure stand as timeless symbols of ancient Egypt.
Also, admire the Sphinx, a symbol of Egyptian myth and power.
Then, visit Sakkara, home to the world’s first large-scale stone structure, & explore the historic ruins of Memphis.
Post-tour, get driven to the airport for your flight to Luxor.
Upon arrival, get driven to your hotel for check-in & overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Luxor East & West Bank Sightseeing Tour | Fly to Cairo
activities: Today, after check-out, enjoy a sightseeing tour of Luxor.
Start with a visit to the Valley of the Kings, the final resting place of Tutankhamun.
Then, marvel at the two massive statues of the towering Colossi of Memnon and explore other attractions.
Later, cross to the East Bank to visit the awe-inspiring Karnak Temple and admire its stunning intricate carvings.
Afterwards, get driven to the airport for your flight back to Cairo.
Upon arrival, check-in to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Old Cairo Sightseeing Tour
activities: In the morning, board your transfer to the historic Old City of Cairo for a sightseeing tour.
Begin at the world-famous Egyptian Museum, home to thousands of ancient artifacts, including the treasures of Tutankhamun.
Then, visit the Coptic district to explore the Abu Sergah Church and marvel at its beautiful frescoes.
Continue to the Hanging Church, an architectural marvel offering stunning views of Cairo.
After an amazing day, get transferred to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Departure Day
activities: Today, after check-out from your hotel, get transferred to the Cairo Airport for your flight back home.
This marks the end to your amazing Egypt trip!

itinerary.day: Day 1 Arrival in Cairo | Day at Leisure
activities: Welcome to Cairo! Upon arrival at the airport, you'll be driven to the hotel.
After you check in, relax for some time.
Later, spend the day at leisure.

You can visit the historic Al Azhar Mosque, renowned for its architectural beauty and academic significance or explore the grand Sultan Hassan Mosque, a masterpiece of Mamluk architecture, among other attraction points.
Later, head to the hotel on your own for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 2 Cairo Sightseeing Tour
activities: In the morning, get ready and board the transfer for the Cairo sightseeing tour.
During this exploration, visit the Pyramids of Giza where you can marvel at the Great Pyramid of Cheops and the Pyramid of Kefren.
Also, visit the Egyptian Museum to view its vast collection of ancient artefacts and the Mosque Of Muhammad Ali, where you can admire the intricate architecture of the place.
Later, you'll be driven back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 3 Transfer to Luxor | Overnight Stay in Cruise | Luxor East Bank Tour
activities: In the morning, you'll transfer to Cairo Airport for your flight to Luxor (tickets included).
Upon arrival, you'll be driven to Luxor Port to board your river cruise.

After settling into your cabin, you'll embark on a tour of Luxor's East Bank, visiting the magnificent Karnak Temple and Luxor Temple, renowned for their grand architecture and historical significance.
Return to the cruise ship for a leisurely evening, enjoying dinner and the serene Nile views before an overnight stay on board.

itinerary.day: Day 4 Luxor West Bank Tour | Cruise Journey to Esna
activities: Begin your morning with a beautiful view of the Niles.
After that, enjoy the Luxor West Bank Tour.
Explore the hidden tombs of pharaohs Ramses III, Seti I, and Amenhotep II, with their intricate chambers and corridors.

Also, admire the towering statues of Amenophis II, remnants of Egypt’s grandeur and visit the majestic Temple of Queen Hatshepsut, renowned for its striking architecture and historical significance, among other attractions.
Afterwards, enjoy your overnight cruise journey to Esna.

itinerary.day: Day 5 Edfu & Kom Ombo Tour | Cruise Journey to Aswan
activities: As your cruise docks at Esna, get ready for the temple tour of Edfu and Kom Ombo.
While in Edfu, explore the Temple of Horus, dedicated to the falcon-headed god, renowned for its remarkable preservation despite Nile flooding.
Then, visit the distinctive Kom Ombo Temple, dedicated to Sobek and Haroeris, and discover its unique features, including a Nilometer for measuring the Nile's levels and mummified crocodiles.
Afterwards, enjoy your overnight cruise journey to Aswan.

itinerary.day: Day 6 Aswan Sightseeing Tour
activities: In the morning, you’ll arrive in Aswan.
Today, begin your day with visits to the Aswan High Dam and the stunning Temple of Philae, renowned for its dedication to the goddess Isis and its beautiful setting on Agilkia Island.
In the afternoon, enjoy a leisurely felucca boat ride on the Nile, admiring the views of the lush Kitchener Island and its Botanical Gardens.
Return to your cruise ship for an overnight stay, soaking in the serene views of the Nile.

itinerary.day: Day 7 Disembark from Cruise | Transfer to Cairo | Giza Pyramids Light & Sound Show
activities: In the morning, disembark the cruise at Aswan Port to board your flight to Cairo (tickets included).
Upon arrival, you'll be driven to your hotel to check in and relax for some time.
Later in the evening, get transferred to the Giza Pyramids for the entertaining Light and Sound Show, where the ancient monuments are illuminated with a dramatic narrative.
After the show, you'll be driven back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 8 Departure Day
activities: Reflect on the incredible experiences you had in Egypt and check out from the hotel.
You'll be transferred to Cairo Airport for your flight back home.
This marks the end of your trip.

destinations.title: Tamil Nadu Getaway | Temple Trails and Coastal Charms
know_before_you_go: All visitors are required to carry valid ID proof.
Meals in the restaurants or cafes are not included.
Kindly note that personal expenses are not included in the package and should be budgeted separately.
Any activities or transfers not specified in the itinerary are not part of the package and require separate arrangements.
Tripdekhoo reserves the right to rearrange or change the itinerary for reasons that are beyond control like Natural calamity, weather conditions, roadblocks, etc.
The hotels are subject to their availability. In case they are not available, the travelers will be accommodated in a property of a similar standard.
Any breakage or damage of any items at the property will be charged at actuals.
Follow local customs and check for photography restrictions in temples.
Wear modest clothing covering shoulders and knees at temples.

itinerary.day: DAY 1 - Arrival in Madurai | Transfer to Rameshwaram | Rameshwaram Sightseeing Tour
activities: Welcome to Madurai! Upon arrival at Madurai Airport/Railway Station, gettransferred to Rameshwaram and check-in at your pre-booked hotel.Later, board the provided transfer to explore this sacred island which ishome to the revered Ramanathaswamy Temple, a masterpiece of Dravidian architecture. Explore the temple's grandeur and then get transferred to Dhanushkodi, a picturesque beach town with a rich history.Later, transfer to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: DAY 2 - Transfer to Kanyakumari | Kanyakumari Sightseeing Tour
activities: Check-out from the hotel in Rameshwaram and get transferred to Kanyakumari, the southernmost tip of India. Upon arrival, check-in to the hotel and get ready for the Kanyakumari tour. Board the provided transfer to reach the pier and take the ferry to the iconic Vivekananda Rock Memorial and the Thiruvalluvar Statue. Later, enjoy at the Kanyakumari Beach, where the Arabian Sea, the Bay of Bengal, and the Indian Ocean converge. Afterwards, get transferred to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: DAY 3 - Transfer to Madurai | Madurai Half-day Sightseeing Tour | Departure
activities: Check-out from the hotel in Kanyakumari and get transferred to Madurai. Upon arrival, discover the rich heritage of Madurai on a half-day sightseeing tour. Visit the historic Meenakshi Amman Temple and witness its stunning architecture. Explore the Thirumalai Nayakkar Palace and the Gandhi Memorial Museum. Later, get transferred to Madurai Airport/Railway Station for your departure back home with wonderful memories.

packages.title: Chennai > Mahabalipuram > Pondicherry > Chennai ( 4 Days 3 Nights )
packages.subTitle: Couple & Family Oriented Tour Package

itinerary.day: DAY 1 - Arrival in Chennai | Chennai Sightseeing Tour
activities: Welcome to Chennai! Upon arriving at Chennai Airport/Railway Station, you'll be transferred to the hotel for check-in. After you relax for a while, get ready for the sightseeing tour of the city. Begin your journey with a transfer to Kapaleeshwarar Temple in Mylapore, famous for its Dravidian architecture. After that, get transferred to explore Fort St. George and the Government Museum, followed by a visit to the Marina Beach. Later, board the transfer back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: DAY 2 - Transfer to Mahabalipuram | Mahabalipuram Sightseeing Tour
activities: After you check-out from the hotel, board your transfer to the hotel in Mahabalipuram. Upon arriving, check-in at the hotel and relax for some time. Later, get transferred for the sightseeing tour of the city, during which you will explore the ancient Shore Temple, located near Mahabalipuram Beach; Arjuna's Penance, which has beautiful carvings on the walls; and the ancient Pancha Rathas, a beautiful complex in the city. Later, you will get transferred back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: DAY 3 - Transfer to Pondicherry | Pondicherry Sightseeing Tour
activities: After checking out from the hotel, board your transfer to your new hotel in Pondicherry. Upon arrival, check-in and relax for some time. Later, get transferred for the sightseeing tour of the city, wherein you'll visit the beautiful Auroville and Sri Aurobindo Ashram, along with the French Quarter. Also, take-in the views of the surroundings with a visit to Paradise Beach and Promenade Beach. Lastly, explore the Botanical Garden and later get transferred back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day: DAY 4 - Departure from Chennai
activities: Take with you cherished memories of Tamil Nadu. Check-out from the hotel and get transferred to Chennai Airport/Railway Station to board your transfer back home.

packages.title: Madurai > Rameswaram > Kodaikanal > Coimbatore ( 6 Days 5 Nights )
packages.subTitle: Couple & Family Oriented Tour Package

itinerary.day: DAY 1 - Arrival in Madurai | Madurai Sightseeing
activities: Welcome to Madurai, Tamil Nadu's cultural capital! Upon arrival in Madurai, get transferred to your hotel for check-in. Later, you’ll be driven for a sightseeing tour which includes the sacred Meenakshi Amman Temple, an architectural masterpiece. Explore the temple's majestic halls before heading to the stunning Thirumalai Nayakkar Palace. Further, visit the Gandhi Memorial Museum, the Koodal Azhagar Temple and the historic Vandiyur Mariamman Teppakulam. Later, get driven back to your hotel.

itinerary.day: DAY 2 - Transfer to Rameswaram | Visit the Ramanathaswamy Temple and Dhanushkodi
activities: In the morning, you’ll check out from the hotel and get transferred to Rameswaram. Enjoy the scenic journey, passing through picturesque landscapes of Tamil Nadu. Upon arrival, settle into your hotel. Later, you'll be driven to the sacred Ramanathaswamy Temple. Marvel at its impressive corridors adorned with intricately carved pillars. Afterward, explore the ruins of Dhanushkodi, a historic town known for its mythical past and tragic history. Later, get driven back to the hotel.

itinerary.day: DAY 3 - Rameswaram Sightseeing Tour
activities: Today, you’ll be driven to explore the sacred city of Rameswaram starting with a visit to the iconic Pamban Bridge. Walk along this architectural marvel that connects Rameshwaram to the mainland of India. Next, visit Gandhamadhana Parvatham, a hilltop site believed to have the footprint of Lord Rama. From here, you can enjoy panoramic views of the island. Conclude your tour with a visit to the ancient Kothandaramaswamy Temple before being transferred back to the hotel.

itinerary.day: DAY 4 - Transfer from Rameswaram to Kodaikanal | Kodaikanal Sightseeing Tour
activities: In the morning, check out from the hotel and get driven to Kodaikanal, also known as the “Princess of Hills”. Upon arrival, check in to your hotel. Later, you'll be driven to visit Kodaikanal Lake, a picturesque man-made lake nestled amidst lush hills. Next, explore the Coaker's Walk, a pathway built on the edge of a cliff. Explore other sites such as Bryant Park and Guna Caves. Lastly, admire the majestic Pillar Rocks, 3 towering rocks standing at 400 feet. Later, get driven back to the hotel.

itinerary.day: DAY 5 - Half Day Kodaikanal Sightseeing Tour
activities: Today will be your second day of exploring Kodaikanal. First, you’ll be driven to Bear Shola Falls, a scenic waterfall set amidst lush green hills. Next, visit Green Valley Viewpoint to admire panoramic views of a 500 ft deep valley. Then, head to Pine Forest to capture stunning photos of tall, dense trees. Conclude your tour with a visit to the sacred Kurinji Andavar Temple and learn about the mystery behind the temple’s name. Lastly, get transferred back to the hotel.

itinerary.day: DAY 6 - Departure
activities: Today, check out from your hotel and get transferred to Coimbatore Airport/Railway Station. From there, you can embark on your journey back home.
